programme.desc: Parents rush their baby to the hospital, but she tragically dies in her mothers arms.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: A train engineer panics when he spots a man lying on the tracks.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: Its up to Dr. G, along with the National Transportation Safety Board, to piece together how a plane crashed.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: Reed Baley is found unconscious the morning after his bachelor party.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: Authorities respond to a fire, only to find Carolyn Caseys body at the center of the blaze.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: A teen is eating breakfast when his dad starts stabbing himself.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: When Marie Allen visits her sister, she makes a gruesome discovery: the 49-year-old is dead on the couch.

programme.title: Enter the Void
programme.desc: 2000-luvun pahamaineisimman elokuvan ohjaaja tekee paluun teoksella, joka on jotain aivan uutta: tunteita kuohuttava ja visuaalisesti valloittava painajaismatka halki elaman, kuoleman ja jalleensyntyman. Palkittu Enter the Void on tummasavyinen, mutta silti raiskyva odysseia nahtyna kuolemaa tekevan paahenkilon houreisin silmin. Tokion neonvaloyossa ammutaan nuori diileri Oscar. Ilman hanen siskoaan tarina paattyisi siihen. Mutta Oscar vannoi aikoinaan, ettei koskaan hylkaisi siskoaan, ja kun hanen ruumiinsa kuolee, alkaa sielun levoton vaellus suurkaupungin likaisilla kujilla ja muistojen synkilla kaytavilla, jotka vaaristyvat minuutti minuutilta.

programme.title: Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Rikkinaisessa perheessa kasvanut 17-vuotias Violet (Fanning) unelmoi pop-tahteydesta ja paosta pienesta englantilaisesta kotikylastaan. Toivoa hanelle tuo kansallinen laulukilpailu Teen Spirit ja epatavallinen mentori, joka opettaa hanta laulamaan sydamestaan. Tie menestykseen on kuitenkin taynna vaaroja ja houkutuksia. Violetin on voitettava epavarmuutensa uskaltaakseen olla oma itsensa ja paastakseen lopulta loistamaan.

programme.title: From Time to Time
programme.desc: Kummittava aavetarina, joka kattaa kaksi maailmaa, yli vuosisadan erolla. Kun 13-vuotias Tolly saa selville, etta han voi salaperaisesti matkustaa naiden kahden valilla, han aloittaa seikkailun, joka paljastaa sukupolvien ajan haudatut perheen salaisuudet.

programme.title: Evil Stepmom
programme.desc: Kun kaksoset haluavat auttaa isaansa deittailemaan uudelleen, he luovat hanelle profiilin deittisivustolle. Vastauksen saaminen ei kesta kauan. Toinen kaksostytoista ystavystyy uuden naisystavan tyttaren kanssa, mutta han tajuaa pian, ettei kaikki ole kohdallaan. Mutta miten han saa vasta rakastuneen isansa huomaamaan asian vakavuuden?

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Before Snowfall
programme.desc: 16-vuotias Siyar kaariytyy muoviin, piiloutuu kuorma-auton oljysailioon ja livahtaa salamatkustajana Irakista rajan yli Turkkiin etsimaan haajuhlasta karannutta sisartaan Nerminia, jonka oli tarkoitus menna Kurdistanissa naimisiin kylanvanhimman pojan kanssa. Perheensa vanhimpana poikana Siyarin tehtavaksi on langennut hakea karkulainen takaisin ja palauttaa perheen kunnia. Istanbulissa Siyar tapaa Evin-nimisen, pojaksi pukeutuneen ja kodittoman tyton, ja he jatkavat matkaa yhdessa. Evin haaveilee paasysta Saksaan isansa luo, Siyar puolestaan alkaa vahitellen kyseenalaistaa oman salaisen tehtavansa mielekkyytta.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: Dont Come Knocking
programme.desc: Hollywood-tahti Howard Spence (Sam Shepard) on nahnyt parempiakin paivia, mutta nyt han ratsastaa vain menneella maineellaan. Jalleen yhden irstailuillan jalkeen han pakenee uuden lankkarin kuvauksista ja ratsastaa preerialle kuin yksi sankareista, joita han on niin usein naytellyt. Han etsii suojaa aitinsa (Eva Marie Saint) luota, jota han ei ole nahnyt vuosiin. Tosin siellakaan han ei viivy kauan saatuaan tietaa, etta hanella saattaa olla poika, josta han ei ole tiennyt. Howardille tama tuo toivoa siita, ettei hanen elamansa ole ollutkaan taysin turhaa. Ehka jossain on paikka, jonne han kuuluu.

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: Courtney Cox tekee ohjausdebyyttinsa lampimalla ja pikimustalla komedialla yksinaisesta Ted Morganista. Ted ei halua mitaan muuta niin paljon kuin paattaa surkean elamansa. Mutta ennen tyhjan potkaisemista han palaa kotikaupunkiinsa, josta alamaki alkoi. Kun mitaan ei ole havittavana, Ted paattaa kostaa lapsuutensa kiusaajalle, kohdata elakkeelle jaaneen matematiikan opettajansa ja iskea koulun nateimman tyton. Mutta mikaan ei ole niin kuin han kuvitteli. Tedin viimeiset hetket saattavatkin olla luultua pidemmat...

programme.title: Incendies
programme.desc: Koskettavassa ja kaanteentekevassa trillerissa Jeanne ja Simon saavat notaarilta heidan aitinsa testamenttaamat kaksi kirjekuorta – toinen heidan kuolleeksi luullulle isalleen ja toinen heidan veljelleen, jonka olemassaolosta sisaruksilla ei ollut mitaan tietoa. Pala palalta heidan rohkean aitinsa tarina seka kirjekuorien vastaanottajien kohtalot alkavat hahmottua.Kantapaan kautta sisarukset loytavat polttomerkatun perintonsa…

programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Cannesissa palkitussa elokuvassa ohiolainen Curtis viettaa rauhallista elamaa vaimonsa ja kuuron tyttarensa kanssa, mutta nakee piinaavan todentuntuisia enneunia uhkaavasta myrskysta. Mielenterveyttaan epaillen mies hakeutuu laakarin puheille, mutta unien jatkuessa han alkaa varautua vanhaa maanalaista myrskysuojaa parantelemalla. Onko puhuri sittenkaan todella tulossa ja tarvitseeko Curtisin perhe lopulta suojaa myrskytuulilta vai Curtisilta itseltaan?

programme.title: Once Were Warriors
programme.desc: Heken perheessa ei ole rauhallista hetkea. Jake Heke on vakivaltainen humalassa, toinen poika on liittynyt katujengiin ja toinen odottaa syytteita. Beth-aidilla ja lapsilla on edessaan vaikea mutta elintarkea paatos: jaada toivottomaan tilanteeseen tai rikkoa kahleensa. Kerran sotureita on palkittu perhedraama menneisyyden hyvaksymisesta ja tulevaisuuden luomisesta.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: Courtney Cox tekee ohjausdebyyttinsa lampimalla ja pikimustalla komedialla yksinaisesta Ted Morganista. Ted ei halua mitaan muuta niin paljon kuin paattaa surkean elamansa. Mutta ennen tyhjan potkaisemista han palaa kotikaupunkiinsa, josta alamaki alkoi. Kun mitaan ei ole havittavana, Ted paattaa kostaa lapsuutensa kiusaajalle, kohdata elakkeelle jaaneen matematiikan opettajansa ja iskea koulun nateimman tyton. Mutta mikaan ei ole niin kuin han kuvitteli. Tedin viimeiset hetket saattavatkin olla luultua pidemmat...

programme.title: Mothers and Daughters
programme.desc: Korkealla Manhattanin ylapuolella trendikas ja onnellinen sinkkutytto Rigby Gray kurkistelee naapureiden asuntoihin ja elamaan. Han piileskelee turvallisesti kameran pitkan linssin takana eika tieda, etta hanen elamansa on muuttumassa lopullisesti. Rigbyn otokset muiden elamasta heraavat eloon risteavissa tarinoissa, joissa aiti-lapsisuhteet esiintyvat kaikissa muodoissaan. Huomaamme, etta siskot ja tuntemattomat, kamppikset ja rakastajat, jopa painajaismaiset anopit voivat olla mita rakastettavimpia aitihahmoja.

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: Journeyman
programme.desc: Puolustettuaan titteliaan rankassa ottelussa, nyrkkeilyn keskisarjan maailmanmestari Matty Burton romahtaa. Matka kohti puhe-, liikunta- ja muistikyvyn palautumista tulee olemaan rankin hanen otteluistaan, mutta palkinto on tyon arvoista, kun hanen suhteensa vaimo Emmaan ja tytar Miaan on pelissa.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: Suicide Kings
programme.desc: Avery on epatoivoinen, silla hanen sisarensa on kidnapattu kahden miljoonan dollarin lunnasvaatimusta vastaan, eika perheen isalla ole rahaa maksaa. Averylla on kuitenkin hurja ja vaarallinen suunnitelma: han aikoo kavereineen siepata elakoityneen mafiajohtaja Charlie Bartoluccin ja pakottaa taman auttamaan sisarensa vapauttamisessa.

programme.title: 30:e november
programme.desc: Adam kavereineen kayttaa aikaansa vihaamiensa maahanmuuttajien hairikointiin. Sitten Adam tapaa perulaisen Julian ja he salamarakastuvat. He tapaavat salassa, koska Adamin kaverit tai Julian perhe eivat hyvaksyisi suhdetta. Ruotsin kansallispaivana Adam kavereineen kohtaavat Julian veli Saschan ystavineen. Kohtaaminen johtaa kahden kuolemaan.

programme.title: Amores Perros
programme.desc: Kauhea auto-onnettomuus yhdistaa kolme tarinaa, joista jokaisessa on mukana hahmoja, jotka kasittelevat menetysta, katumusta ja elaman ankaraa todellisuutta, kaikki rakkauden nimissa.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.desc: In 1980, Michigan resident Shannon Mohr died in what was reported to be a horseback riding accident by her new husband David Davis. After her death, Shannons family reported to police their suspicions that Davis seemed far from grief-stricken.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Joann Katrinak is found dead in a corn field with her son, the obvious suspect is her husband. But insects found on the bodies reveal a vital clue which uncovers a twisted story.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On the night of May 22, 1992, Betty Wilson returned home and walked up the stairs to the bedroom. She discovered her husband lying in a pool of blood. Jack Wilson had obviously been murdered...but how? And by whom? Even the experts couldnt agree.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police investigate a missing college girl and discover her double life: attending school by day and working as a call-girl by night. Her body is found and investigators find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, Marie Robards suffered the loss of her father due to a heart attack - but it was more sinister.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1992, Laura Houghteling disappeared from her Bethesda home and was never seen again. Lauras bedroom was searched and forensic science was used to direct them a to prime suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1985, 121 people in South Dakota and Minnesota were struck by a mysterious illness. There had been only one outbreak like it, and when it happened again no one could figure out why.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In rural Canada, Dr. John Schneeberger is accused of sedating and sexually assaulting one of his female patients and his stepdaughter. DNA tests demonstrate that the doctor is innocent, but the patient insists that he sedated and raped her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1994, Rhoda Nathan was found murdered in a Cincinnati hotel room. When hotel employee Elwood Jones visited the emergency room for an infected hand, which he said was cut on a dumpster, the doctor recognized the injury as something else.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a convenience store employee is found dead, police find the murder has been caught on a security camera.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Survivors of Nazi atrocities recognized Archbishop Trifa as having led an attack against Jews during WWII.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman was reported missing after a fight with her husband. Police were suspicious of a suspect who reported a fire in his car. Two tiny drops of blood were found in the interior. A tiny clue inside the suspects watchband helped solve the case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother claims that an intruder murdered her two sons, but lacking a motive, police use blood-spatter analysis and behavioral profiling to reconstruct a different scenario.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police suspect Dr. John Boyle in the disappearance of his wife when he buys a new house with a woman pretending to be his spouse. The police later find a body in the basement of his new house.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Women in a Louisiana city live in fear of a rapist who leaves no clues to his identity. But technology and behavioral science combine to give police a new forensic tool.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Dianna Green was brutally attacked in her own home and her unborn child was killed. After coming out of a coma and regaining her memory, she is able to identify her husband as the perpetrator.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While Earl Morris was vacationing in California, he learned his wife Ruby Morris had gone missing from their home in Arizona. The results of the investigation surprised everyone...especially Earl Morris.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, when a fundamentalist group starts attacking and robbing banks in Spokane, Washington, authorities know immediately that they are dealing with experienced criminals.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Professional photographer Charles Rathbun claims model Linda Sobek died during a consensual sexual encounter gone wrong, but Sobeks corpse and some high-tech digital imagery tell a more sinister story.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1989, 4-year-old April Loveless was found dead in the backyard of her Texas home. Her mother Debbie Loveless and stepfather John Miller told police that she was attacked and killed by the family dogs. Investigators did not agree.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Who was the sexual offender who murdered two boys in Nebraska? The key to stopping him would be the unique composition of the "junk rope" he used to tie his victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a search for the killer of two teenagers in Texas, a behavioral profile led to suspect Jason Massey, and hard science proved the profile was correct. Massey was executed by lethal injection on April 3, 2001.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a decomposed body is found stuffed in a barrel, its easy to presume murder. One of the few clues was an address book found along with the body.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For 15 months, a serial killer was strangling prostitutes in Florida then taunting police by leaving the bodies in plain sight. The only clues were a tire impression and some threads.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A serial bomber was waging a vendetta against the legal profession. A judge, two attorneys and even a courthouse had been targeted. Employing a range of forensic techniques, investigators used evidence from the bombs to lead them to the perpetrator.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1988, when a patient dies unexpectedly in the office of California neurologist Richard Boggs, police begin what they think will be a routine investigation. Soon they uncover a bizarre story of corpse stealing, fake identity and sexual perversion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the wife of a well-known dentist is found dead, police struggle to identify a suspect. Some fibers and a study of the weather patterns on the night of the murder break the case open.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two people in Seattle, Washington died after taking an over-the-counter pain reliever. Lab analysis of the pills showed they were tainted with a lethal concentration of cyanide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An investigation of a pediatrician, prompted by the death of one of her patients, leads to a Texas hospital where the pediatric mortality rate is higher than at any hospital in the country.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Sometime during a neighborhood Christmas party, five-year-old Melissa Brannen disappeared. Investigators turned to forensic science to help them see what the witnesses missed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Scott Dunn was missing and when the police sprayed his bedroom with Luminol, a scene of horrific violence emerged. Now investigators faced a daunting task.

programme.desc: A five-round heavyweight title eliminator between the number one ranked contender Levi Rigters (18-2, 8 KO) and ‘The Golden Wolf’ Bahram Rajabzadeh (69-3, 61 KO). The winner will face ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven (64-10, 21 KO) on December 7 in the main event of COLLISION 7. In the co-main event of the evening, Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-4-1, 13 KO) clashes with Nico ‘Big Sexy’ Horta (23-9, 3 KO) in a monster heavyweight clash with big implication for the rankings. Croatian kickboxing legend Mladen Brestovac (55-14-1, 37 KO) will make his final walk to the ring in his hometown of Zagreb. ‘The Scorpion Sting’ will take on newcomer Karim Dian (16-13, 3 KO) to cap off an illustrious...

programme.title: Santa Fe Passage
programme.desc: A disgraced Indian scout and his partner are hired to escort a wagonload of guns through Indian territory.

programme.title: Fistful of Lead
programme.desc: Sartana contends with various parties - including a dapper rival gunfighter, an alluring saloon owner and a Mexican bandit - who are intent on acquiring a mining directors gold.

programme.title: Up the MacGregors
programme.desc: The Macgregor family is back and this time they have their women with them, in the hunt for the men who have stolen their gold.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 37, 38, 39
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Comanche
programme.desc: Common efforts of the U.S. government and the Comanche nation to negotiate a peace treaty are sabotaged by renegade Indians and by the short-sighted Indian Commissioner.

programme.title: The Over the Hill Gang
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals are hired to clean up a lawless town.

programme.title: King of the Pecos
programme.desc: Profiteer Alexander Stiles wants a million acres in Pecos River country, but rancher Claybor refuses to sell Sweetwater. When Claybor and his wife are murdered by Stiles hired guns, their son John survives and flees to Austin, where a new chapter of revenge and justice begins.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman whos rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.

programme.title: God Is My Colt
programme.desc: A Army agent goes undercover to clean up corrupt Langford City full of Mexican outlaws.

programme.title: Run, Man, Run
programme.desc: Several competing groups and mavericks (including the lead character Cuchillo) are hunting a gold treasure of $3,000,000. The gold was reserved for the Mexican revolution.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP13-16
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Buddy Goes West
programme.desc: Two outlaws, "The Doctor" and the Indian Girolamo, help a village fight a gang and a corrupt sheriff who has discovered gold beneath the town.

programme.title: Death Rides a Horse
programme.desc: A young gunfighter plans to track down and eliminate the bandits who killed his family, and forms a tenuous alliance with an aging ex-outlaw, till the surprising end.

programme.title: Heroes of Fort Worth
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a group of confederate soldiers with the help of Apache Indians, try to defeat a Union fort, while trying to gain support from Emperor Maximillian of Mexico.

programme.title: Duel in the Sun
programme.desc: After her father is executed, Pearl Chavez moves in with distant relatives in Texas. While Laura Belle and Jesse welcome her, the ranch’s patriarch despises her, and rebellious son Lewt becomes dangerously obsessed. As Pearl is torn between desire and danger, family tensions explode around her.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 40, 41, 42
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Ramon the Mexican
programme.desc: Ramon avenges his brothers murder and kills the Baxter Family.

programme.title: Custer of the West
programme.desc: George Armstrong Custers love of the heroic traditions of the Calvary and his distaste with the coming of industrialization leads him to his destiny at the Little Big Horn.

programme.title: No Killing Without Dollars
programme.desc: Lawrence White returns to Owell Rock seeking revenge for his father’s murder. To protect his identity and strategy, he adopts a new name and hires another man to impersonate Lawrence White, setting a dangerous game of deception and vengeance in motion.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP09-12
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Apache Rifles
programme.desc: In 1879 Arizona, Captain Jeff Stanton leads a cavalry unit to return the Mescalero Apaches to their reservation after attacks on settlers. Capturing the chiefs son, Stanton negotiates a fragile truce, but greedy townsfolk plot to break it. As Stanton is replaced by a harsher commander, tensions rise, leading to disastrous consequences for both sides.

programme.title: Something Big
programme.desc: A man kidnaps the wife of a cavalry commander in order to exchange her for a Gatling gun thats being sold by a gun runner.

programme.title: Bullwhip
programme.desc: In order to avoid the hangmans noose, a cowboy agrees to marry a beautiful but fiery redhead.

programme.title: The Cry of the Black Wolves
programme.desc: Halfwit Indian Akaena promises a fictitious treasure to anyone who takes her down south where the sun always shines.

programme.title: Black Jack
programme.desc: After a bank robbery, Jack Murphys gang turns on him when they suspect he’ll keep the loot. They torture him and kill his sister, but Jack survives. Now, he rides for revenge in this gritty Western tale of betrayal, violence, and retribution.

programme.title: Troublemakers
programme.desc: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

programme.title: Man with the Golden Pistol
programme.desc: Doc McGregor, former surgeon become player, is wrongly accused of murder and pursued by Slade, a bounty hunter.

programme.title: Find a Place to Die
programme.desc: An outcast Confederate soldier redeems himself by defending a woman against bandits willing to kill for her goldmine claim.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 43, 44, 45
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Heres a tongue twister: Theresa, tuna, tangerine! In this episode, host Theresa Visintin picks her favourite letter, "T," and introduces us to scrumptious recipes using tuna and tangerine. Theresa loves tuna and Italian cuisine, so naturally she combines both to create a mouth-watering pasta with some savoury tomato, olive, and tuna sauce. Next, Theresa satisfies her sweet tooth with a decadent tangerine parfait! Using the sweet juice of the tangerine, Theresa creates gelatin, with a hint of orange liqueur. She tops it all off by whipping up a fluffy cream to complete this sweet treat. Then its time for a real challenge: tuna and tangerine in one recipe!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "H" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas decides to take on the unique flavours of halibut and horseradish. She starts with a perfectly prepared prosciutto wrapped halibut, pairing the buttery flavour of the fish with the saltiness of the cured meat. Throw in some dill potatoes and youve got a beautifully balanced dish. Next up, Chef Lauren show us how to make a delightful roast beef dip with a zesty horseradish sauce using carrots, vinegar, mayo and a little lemon. Finally, she is challenged to make a dish that combines both ingredients, and does she ever deliver!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this letter "P" challenge, Chef Robert Jewell showcases his vegetarian skills using pecans and peppers. Despite his cowboy roots, Robert shows us he can kick it with vegetarians by cooking up a juicy meatless "meatloaf" using pecans. But, no "meatloaf" would be complete without a gravy! Robert fries up earthy portobello mushrooms before adding a special ingredient to thicken the gravy, you guessed it -- pecans! Now, on to peppers. Robert doubles up, using both the vegetable and seasoning, to make a delicious red pepper coulis with herb and pepper crusted beef tenderloin. Robert goes a little nuts when he prepares his final recipe using both pecans and peppers.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Cheese or chocolate? Why not both! In this "C" challenge, host Theresa Visintin takes on both decadent ingredients. But first, she shows us that being cheesy is easy, especially when you stuff chicken breast with creamy goats cheese and finely diced apples. Theresa takes the flavour one step further by coating the stuffed chicken with sage, parmesan, and panko bread crumbs, then frying it to a crispy golden brown. Next, Theresa whips up a dessert fan favourite, the decadent and oh-so-irresistible dark chocolate lava cake. Finally, Theresa has an irresistible recipe using ooey gooey cheese and warm chocolate.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Adopted Tara Broadbent is shocked by the results of her DNA test and learns more about her biological ancestry through food.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Martina Castillo learns more about her heritage with the help of Host Tyrone Edwards and expert chefs.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Jesse Magallanes was raised in an Argentinian household, but he knows theres more to his ancestry. Host Tyrone Edwards reveals the results of his DNA test and Jesse begins his journey of self-discovery.

programme.desc: Thai chef Pailin Chongchitnant explores the cuisine of Northern Thai city Chiang Mai with red chili pork dip, minced pork salad, Thai-style chicken noodle soup, and Burmese-style curry.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Corn: Argentinas favourite ingredient
programme.desc: Corn is a big staple ingredient in Argentinian cuisine, and chef Natalia Machado makes tamales, corn and squash and chorizo stew, chicken in a creamy corn sauce, and then creamy corn pudding for dessert.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Italian dishes that will impress any dinner guest
programme.desc: From a trendy meatball appetizer to creamy pasta with chickpeas, decadent stuffed mussels, and succulent salmon with lavender and honey, Chef Vanessa Gianfrancesco wows again with her Italian cuisine.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef and cookbook author Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen schools us on traditional Japanese foods as she makes tofu rice pockets, miso glazes, and rice flour dumplings.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Portugal, Argentina, India, Japan

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "C" challenge, Chef Robert Jewell cooks up recipes using coconut and crab before combining both into a single recipe. Using sweet coconut, Robert makes a classic dessert -- an irresistible coconut cream pie. He starts with a delectable crunchy graham cracker crust and tops his pie with fluffy whipped cream and toasted coconut flakes. Next, Robert transforms a fresh soft-shell crab into a delicious, spicy, and crunchy dish. The best part? Its fast and easy to make. After soaking the crab in milk, Robert dunks it into a flour-cornmeal mixture and fries it until golden brown. But thats not all, Robert whips up the perfect dipping sauce, using spicy smoked- jalapeno, lime, and...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Its all about sesame and scallops in this letter "S" challenge, and host Theresa Visintin has some appetizing ideas up her sleeve. First, she shows us how to make scallop cassoulet, a simple recipe that can be cooked even faster than it can eaten! Theresa browns the tender scallops in delicious bacon fat and then bakes it on a bed of creamy kidney beans. Next, Theresa uses sesame seeds to create a zesty sauce for a take-out favourite, made in your very own kitchen - noodles! For her final recipe, our culinary host combines sesame and scallops, creating a juicy, crunchy masterpiece.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing Sunday dinner! Josh makes roast chicken with herbs de Provence, while Erica prepares two kinds of pasta!

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev prepares some of his favorite street food dishes that are easy to eat on the go, including Peruvian Ceviche, Tteokbokki from South Korea, and Manakish Flatbreads from Lebanon.

programme.desc: Chef Dev shows off street food recipes that use less common cuts of meat, including Fish Head Curry from Singapore, Pork and Pâte Banh Mi from Vietnam, and Jamaican Jerk Oxtail.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Honey, Cherries, Garlic Scapes and Carrots
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms market fresh honey, cherries, garlic scapes and carrots into two simple chic sides and an irresistible dessert.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Sprouts, Veggies and Potatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera creates two summer fresh salads and a hearty breakfast using sprouts, potatoes and leafy lambs quarters.

programme.title: One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.desc: Celebrate the holidays with One World Kitchens baked treats from Italy, Japan, Thailand, and Argentina. Our hosts Vanessa, Hana, Pailin, and Natalia put a global twist on classic recipes with Panforte, honey-drizzled Struffoli, Matcha Cheesecake, Thai Shortbread Cookies, Turron, and Pan Dulce. Our warm hosts serve up sweet treats inspired by traditions and family secrets. One World Kitchen: Bakes the Holidays will put you in the festive spirit and bring new holiday traditions to your home!

programme.title: BLITZN
programme.desc: Get ready for a special holiday BLITZ! with master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she prepares her favorite holiday cocktails and party snacks in the Gusto TV kitchen!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever: Holiday Edition
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Wizard of Whatever: Holiday Edition
programme.desc: Gusto TV’s Wizard of Whatever, Chef Kyle Crawford, is dishing up a holiday feast! There’ll be food, fun, elves… and even jolly old St. Nick himself may make an appearance! Join in as Kyle cooks up a Christmas goose complete with stuffing and gravy, plus all the sides and salads, and even a flashy flambe dessert! Merry whatever!

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Twists on the Classics
programme.desc: Christmas is right around the corner and it calls for a little fun - like a twist on traditional holiday desserts! FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: TWISTS ON THE CLASSICS offers a new take on some of your favourites to bring you a fresh perspective and world of flavour for the holidays! Enchanting host Jessica McGovern plays off classic desserts, serving up handy hints on how to get the most out of every bite. From sweet and fluffy Gumdrop Cakes drizzled with a light lemony glaze to a delectable Eggnog Ski Slope Cake decorated with rosemary trees and a few friends to hit the hills, Jessicas unique holiday recipes will surly make it on your list of Christmas traditions!

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Our Favourite Holiday Recipes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One World Kitchen: Our Favourite Holiday Recipes
programme.desc: In this special holiday episode of One World Kitchen, Hana (Japan), Vanessa (Italy), Natalia (Argentina), and Pailin (Thailand) get together to cook their favorite traditional holiday dishes influenced by their respective cultures. Christmas Sushi Rolls, Veal in a Creamy Tuna Sauce with Capers, Striped Bass in Garlic and Lime Marinade, and an epic Timballo. For the final recipe, our hosts combine all the flavors of One World Kitchen into a truly internationally-inspired turkey dish.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italian Christmas
programme.desc: BONACINIS ITALIAN CHRISTMAS is a heartwarming one-hour holiday special featuring celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini as he shares some of his favourite Italian Christmas Eve dishes. Michael invites us to the set of his series "Bonacinis Italy" to cook up traditional Italian fare like Salt Cod Mousse on Polenta Crostini and Pork Braised in Milk. Michael takes us on a holiday culinary journey as he explores homey Christmas flavours and traditions, offering tips for perfecting dishes from the regions of Veneto, Sardinia, Calabria, Sicily, and Emilia Romagna.

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.desc: The holidays are here! And the holidays come with a lineup of treats you wont be able to resist! From sweet and salty to traditional and unconventional, FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: BIG WOW DESSERTS covers it all. To get in the holiday spirit, enchanting host Jessica McGovern introduces two desserts that could impress any Scrooge. First, Jessica bakes a decadent Chocolate Yule Log stuffed with a creamy Salted Caramel Frosting and finishes with a holiday-inspired cake decorated with homemade peppermint candy canes! Interwoven with tricks of the trade, Jessica guides us through her simple yet inspiring treats that are perfect for a big Christmas celebration.

programme.title: Spencers Big Holiday
programme.desc: No matter how you celebrate the holidays, let Spencer Watts help you plan the menu, in SPENCER’S BIG HOLIDAY! In this festive one-hour holiday special, Spencer Watts is serving up some of his favourite holiday meals, treats, and drinks. Follow Spencer as he shows us how to sail through the hectic holiday season with style, from brunch to the moment the clock strikes midnight.

programme.title: One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.desc: One BIG Recipe is all about cooking for family and friends and so are the holidays! Check out cool chef Kimberly Lallouzs take on holiday favourites in this special seasonal episode. Her first course is a Moroccan spiced Beet Latke with lightly dressed greens and creme fraiche. Next, whole fennel is braised tender, gratineed and spiked with apple chutney. Entrees include a one-of-a-king Turkey Breast Buche de Noel roulade and a juicy, beefy espresso-red wine spiked Brisket roast. Along with her main course come her unique, single-serving Stuffin muffins, two sauces, sugar snap peas and watermelon radishes. And dont leave without her sweet hostess gifts, White Chocolate Brittle-Bark...

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.desc: Christmas is near, and the pressure is on! Between work, home, friends, and family, the list of people to buy for is endless. To help us through this busy time, FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: EDIBLE GIFTS offers up four creative and more personal options to make the holidays cheaper, sweeter, and filled with love. Fun host Jessica McGovern shows us how to bake something for everyone including Crispy Brittle Bark covered in chocolate, rich Coal Cookies that are sweet with a bit of heat, adorable peanut butter-chocolate Reindeer Cupcakes, and easy-to-make Christmas Puzzle Cookies.

programme.title: Christmas With Bonacini
programme.desc: Christmas with Bonacini is a charming one-hour holiday special featuring celebrity chef Michael Bonacini and his son Oscar. Michael inspires with his favourite Christmas recipes that will add a twinkle of sophistication to your dinner table while lifting holiday spirits.

programme.title: Spencers Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Join charismatic chef Spencer Watts at his glorious rooftop patio for a one-hour special featuring a full holiday spread, all made on the BBQ. Spencer’s festive menu is all about creative BBQ twists with his delectable, mouth-watering recipes including Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie, and Asparagus with Smoked Salmon Dip. Save room for the piece de Q-sistance: Smoked Turkey Two Ways. This year, take your holiday feast outside and serve up something deliciously different.

programme.title: Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.desc: In this heartwarming holiday special, Chef Michael Bonacini invites us to his cozy farmhouse in Ontario for a charming Christmas feast. In this scenic winter retreat, Bonacini interprets classic Welsh and Italian Christmas dishes from his childhood. Michael cooks up comforting dishes from hearty potato leek soup, to succulent roast lamb, to classic molten chocolate lava cake. As he explores homey Christmas flavours, Michael shares his traditions and gives tips for perfecting the holiday meal.

programme.title: Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.desc: Spencer Watts serves up his take on traditional holiday fare, showing us that you can make an impressive dinner without the stress. programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europes leading MMA shows, since its inception in 2006 its has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: World renowned jiu-jitsu expert Rodrigo Damm takes on the hard hitting Black Mamba. And wrestler Mike Brown takes on Yves Edwards, a veteran of the UFC and Pride.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europes leading MMA shows, since its inception in 2006 its has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This is heavyweight fighting at its best and bloodiest. Finnish muay thai champion Jarno Nurminen makes his mised martial art debut against Korean judo expert Sag Su Lee. And in one of the sports best brawls, Roy Nelson goes toe-to-toe with Josh Curran.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesnt let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athletes success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Craig Wilson as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Mike Short comes from a history of street fighting and recognizes the importance of training and discipline. He has been coaching Boxing for many years and relishes the fact that his entire family comes together at his events, run out of Dekada Gym.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Out of the Cage reveals the private thoughts and emotions of an MMA fighter, the ambition that drives them and how they are affected when encountering defeat or facing triumph. Featuring Jesse Arnett at HK39

programme.desc: Chael Sonnen has trained with Team Quest, alongside fighters like Matt Lindland and Randy Couture. Tim Credeur has kept busy fighting on the US navy jiu-jitsu and judo teams, and making some cash in bullpen fights in Tijuana.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: MMA Veteran Nick Thompson goes up against the brute force of wrestling star Davion Peterson. Thompson has more pro fight experience than anyone on the first series, and will need all of it to hold his own against the relentless Peterson.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Bill Mahood has studied every martial art imaginable, and hell need all that experience when he takes on Kalil Ibrahim, a karate ans kickboxing expert. Steve Steinbeiss fights Jeff Ford, an MMA champion and a personal trainer on VH1s Celebrity Fight Club.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Ron Bushfield takes us through his wrestling and coaching career, and gives us some insight into what his days look like. programme.title: Hot Ones

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Action Bronson is a rapper, chef and NYT best-selling author - and is in the hot seat for a round two.

programme.title: Bad samaritan
programme.desc: Sean ja Derek ovat pikkurikollisia, joiden erikoisuutena on pyrkia toihin ravintoloiden parkkipaikoille tarkoituksenaan tyhjentaa rikkaiden vieraiden koti naiden poissa ollessa. Murtautuessaan varakkaan Cale Erendreichin kotiin Sean loytaa salaoven, jonka tiirikoi auki. Han nakee kauhistuksekseen pahoin runnellun naisen, joka on sidottu kidutuspenkkiin. Han pakenee paniikissa ja soittaa poliisille, mutta paikalle tullessaan poliisi ei loyda jalkeakaan uhrista. Sean ja Derek alkavat tunnontuskissaan itse selvittaa tapausta, mutta Cale Erendreich tietaa, keita he ovat…

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: Ryyppyjuhlista ja putkareissuista uudestisyntyneeksi kristityksi. Texasin oljykenttien mustasta kullasta Washingtonin Valkoiseen taloon. Isan varjosta sotaan vihollisen lin-jojen takana Irakissa. Tama on Yhdysvaltain 43. presidentin uskomaton tarina. Vihasitpa tai rakastitpa hanta - tai rakastitpa vihata hanta - George W. Bush on kiis-tatta historian kiistellyin ja puhutuin yhdysvaltalainen presidentti. Oscar®-voittaja Oliver Stone tarkastelee elokuvassaan W:ta lempeasti ja piirtaa yllattavan sympaatti-sen kuvan maalaispojasta, josta - lahinna onnettoman sattuman kautta - tuli maail-man mahtavin mies.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: Isa ja tytar nousevat nopeaan KTX-junaan, jonka pitaisi vieda heidat Soulista Busaniin. Mutta matkan varrella alkaa maailmanloppu, ja suurin osa ihmisista muuttuu lihansyoja-zombeiksi.

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: Michael Faraday on katkera FBI:n agenttina toimineen vaimonsa kuolemasta. Han asuu poikansa Grantin kanssa rauhallisella esikaaupunkialueella, jossa he tutustuvat miellyttaviin naapureihinsa Oliver ja Cheryl Langiin. Ystavyyden syventyessa Michael alkaa epailemaan naapureidensa todellista taustaa ja uskoo loytaneensa yhteyksia terrorismiin.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: Hunter S. Thompsonin Rommipaivakirja-romaaniin pohjautuva elokuva seuraa kiertolaiselamaa viettavan reportteri Paul Kempin (Johnny Depp) viinanhuuruista matkaa halki Puerto Ricon pittoreskin saaren. Han on pian omaksunut paikallisvaeston rommiinhukuttautuvan elamantavan, ja tavattuaan hamarabisneksiin sekaantuneen amerikkalaisliikemiehen, Sandersonin (Aaron Eckhart), Paul on myos korviaan myoten retkussa miehen huumaavan kuumaan kihlattuun, Chenaultiin (Amber Heard).

programme.title: Tulitikkutehtaan tytto
programme.desc: Äitinsa ja isapuolensa kanssa asuva ja tulitikkutehtaan liukuhihnalla tyoskenteleva Iiris (Kati Outinen, Mies vailla menneisyytta ja Le Havre) erehtyy luulemaan tanssiravintolassa kohtaamansa miehen kanssa viettamaansa yota rakkaudeksi. Vaarinkasityksella on kohtalokkaat seuraukset.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: Elegy
programme.desc: David Kepesh on arvostettu yliopiston professori, jonka maailma jarkkyy, kun hanen luennoilleen ilmestyy kaunis Consuela Castillo. Consuelan kauneus ajaa professorin himon ja omistushalun pyorteeseen, jollaista han ei ole aiemmin kokenut. Mutkikas rakkaustarina saa alkunsa. Perustuu Pulitzer-palkitun Philip Rothin teokseen.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

programme.title: Youre Not You
programme.desc: Kaksinkertainen Oscar-voittaja Hillary Swank on menestynyt konserttipianisti Kate, jossa todetaan parantumaton sairaus ALS. Hanen perheensa jarjestaa hanelle parasta mahdollista hoitoa, mutta Kate itse antautuu taysin epapatevan Becin hoiviin. Hoitoon sisaltyy yhta lailla naurua kuin kyyneleitakin, ja nama kaksi taysin erilaista naista loytavat toistensa suurimmat vahvuudet.

programme.title: Kuutio
programme.desc: Seitseman toisilleen ventovierasta henkiloa, joilla kaikilla on erilaiset persoonat, asetetaan vasten tahtoaan loputtomaan sokkeloon, joka on taynna hengenvaarallisia ansoja.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: Hotet
programme.desc: Lasse Brudell on vastaava ohjelmoija Vidselin lentotukikohdassa Norrbottenissa. Han tyoskentelee huippusalaisen JAS Gripeniin liittyvan EWS-puolustusjarjestelman parissa. Majuri Haglund, karaistunut sotaveteraani, johtaa armeijan erikoisjoukkoja. Miesten tiet kohtaavat, kun Haglund kutsutaan nostamaan turvatoimien tasoa Gripenin ulkomaisille ostajaehdokkaille valmisteltavaa esittelya varten.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.desc: A teenage girl is stalked, sexually assaulted and shot in the face.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalos fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.
