programme.title: False Witness
programme.desc: Block Management is one of the keys to great hunting in Montana but the rules are set. If you are going to break them the Wardens will be there to hold you accountable.

programme.title: Day 6
programme.desc: After exploring Peru, Jalou has to get over her fear when she goes white water kayaking. In Thailand, Kevin is feeling the pressure.

programme.title: Day 7
programme.desc: After a week, Kevin and Jalou find themselves in the same country again: Canada. They travel from Vancouver to Whistler for the final challenge.

programme.title: The Pagoda
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Geared Up S1 - "The Pagoda"
programme.desc: The team does a restoration modification of a 1964 Mercedes Benz 230 SL, adding custom made wheels and a modern engine.

programme.title: The Blazer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Geared Up S1 - "The Blazer"
programme.desc: A 1970 K5 Chevrolet Blazer undergoes a transformation with new paint, interior, and a diesel engine conversion.

programme.title: Episode Seven
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Seven"
programme.desc: Nike reviews the innovative 2021 Mercedes-Benz S Class. Mike explores how cities adapt for autonomous vehicles. Nik introduces the 2022 Acura MDX with Amazon Alexa, and the all-new 2022 Kia Carnival.

programme.title: Episode Eight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Eight"
programme.desc: Mike and Nik review the 2021 Ford Mustang Mach-E. Nik predicts the Genesis G80 will challenge German manufacturers. He showcases the 2021 Mini GP and Polestar 2. Mike explores the 2021 Infiniti QX50.

programme.title: Deadmans Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Deadmans Survival"
programme.desc: Island Air battles time and elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Morgan"
programme.desc: Mat’s demanding client Gordon is in search of a Morgan, but will he be able to find the ideal car for the right price?

programme.title: Citroen DS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Citroen DS"
programme.desc: Mat goes in search of a perfect Citroen DS for Leon, a man who has strong connections to the DS, and to France.

programme.title: Mini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mini"
programme.desc: Mat Watson travels Europe on the trail of a very special 1960s Mini.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in Las Vegas in a million dollar Lamborghini SVJ roadster. Taken under the wing of Patrick, founder of the Junkyard Pirates, Alex is brought into the rat rod world - home to American mavericks and outsiders.

programme.title: Miami
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Miami"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie is given the keys to a five million dollar Pagani Huayra L’Ultimo as she explores the sub-culture of lowriders with the seal of approval from Horacio Pagani himself. Will she be accepted into this tribe?

programme.title: Detroit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Detroit"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars, born in Detroit, and her journey takes her in different directions.

programme.title: Brazil
programme.desc: The World’s best Brazilian rider opens the doors to his house to show how it all started and brings us to Mexico for the most famous urban race in the world.

programme.title: Argentina
programme.desc: Two talented Canadian brothers and pro MTB riders decide to go on a freeride trip together and choose to explore the remote desert of Argentina.

programme.title: South Africa
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 MTB Heroes S3 - "South Africa"
programme.desc: We follow the fastest and most stylish female MTB pro rider in the world during a trip to South Africa where she will ride the best trails around Cape Town.

programme.title: To Beep, or Not to Beep
programme.sub-title: S11 : E08 Graveyard Carz S11 - "To Beep, or Not to Beep"
programme.desc: While the ghouls finish up the ornamentation and chrome moldings for the 1969 GTX, Cousin Dougie enlists the Greenhorns help to disassemble our first 1970 Road Runner - with careful precision to hopefully find the cars broadcast sheet.

programme.title: Amentini, Shaken Not Stirred
programme.sub-title: S11 : E09 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Amentini, Shaken Not Stirred"
programme.desc: The 1970 Challenger in B7 Blue owned by the Amentinis is finished and ready to be revealed. See every moment of its restoration, from dead to resurrected and detailed to the way it left the factory floor. This is what Graveyard Carz lives for.

programme.title: Dougonit
programme.desc: Whether its building an engine, restoring parts, or hiding mannequins, Marks Cousin Dougie is on it. Hes one of the most pivotal Ghouls, working on a vast number of Mopar restoration projects or tasks that are essential to the success of the shop.

programme.title: Ken Henderson Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Fight to Survive S1 - "Ken Henderson Story"
programme.desc: Best friends, Ed Cohen and Ken Henderson, set out for two days of Texas gulf fishing. Tragedy strikes and the two men are stranded adrift in hostile waters.

programme.title: C.J. Wickersham Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Fight to Survive S1 - "C.J. Wickersham Story"
programme.desc: This week, well hear the harrowing tale of C.J. Wickersham who will fight to survive a shark attack while spear fishing.

programme.title: Jamey Mosch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fight to Survive S1 - "Jamey Mosch"
programme.desc: This week on Trip Gone Bad, were following hunter Jamey Mosch into the Florida everglades as his hunting trips turns into a 4 day nightmare.

programme.title: Prayer Point
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point"
programme.desc: On day three at "Prayer Point", Casey faces another opportunity, inconveniently timed. While answering natures call, a bull respondes to cow calls from camp, appearing across the river.

programme.title: Night Stalkers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Night Stalkers"
programme.desc: Exhausted and famished, the brothers persist downstream, barely mustering energy to set camp. They find abundant signs of moose and favorable terrain for their habitat.

programme.title: Exploration Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Exploration Camp"
programme.desc: Days pass, moose elusive since Day 11. Restless nights with lurking creatures. They find an abandoned trappers cabin, home to a huge grizzly.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: The team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Unprecedented three rescues in under twelve hours.

programme.title: Weary Travelers
programme.desc: R.L. and Casey venture far from camp to access prime moose territory during the rut. Meanwhile, bad weather prompts Chris to scout a potential new extraction point.

programme.title: Lifted
programme.desc: As their Alaska journey nears its end, Kaid and R.L. reflect on lifes priorities and lessons learned. Lifelong bonds are cemented as they prepare for extraction.

programme.title: Korea
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 The Travel Bug S2 - "Korea"
programme.desc: Korea is a fascinating and complex nation. It’s a place where ancient Confucianism is juxtaposed with an insatiable appetite for technology. We start at the heart of this thriving nation, Seoul.

programme.title: Hawaii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 The Travel Bug S2 - "Hawaii"
programme.desc: Hawaii is arguably the world’s best-known island holiday destination. It’s an adventure lover’s playground with volcanoes, mountains, diving, surfing and loads of other fun activities.

programme.title: Taiwan, Part I
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 The Travel Bug S2 - "Taiwan, Part I"
programme.desc: As far as cities go, Taipei is one of the most intense, chaotic and diverse metropolitan centres on earth. We learn about Taiwan’s turbulent history, take a look at the country’s unique culture and indulge in the famous street food.

programme.title: Yerevan
programme.desc: Josh goes local exploring in Armenia and its capital Yerevan, visiting some amazing abandoned Soviet buildings, a knitting factory and a luxurious hotel.

programme.title: Gary, Indiana
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Epic Exploring S2 - "Gary, Indiana"
programme.desc: Josh is back in Gary, Indiana, for a local exploring adventure. With friends, he visits a former bank, the memorial auditorium and Union Train Station.

programme.title: Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: White Death
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trail S1 - "White Death"
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse Seven has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: Stripped
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Stripped"
programme.desc: Meet Nigel McNally and the team from Kestrel Beer who has hopes of breaking the land speed record in a restored 1930’a Riley Kestrel 9.

programme.title: Dyno Test
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Dyno Test"
programme.desc: The record attempt is only one week away and everything seems to be on track, until the results of a dyno test put a spanner in the works.

programme.title: Staying out of trouble
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S2 - "Staying out of trouble"
programme.desc: In this episode, we experience the beginning of the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa together with some of the most promising teams aiming for victory.

programme.title: Surviving the Night
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S2 - "Surviving the Night"
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn that driving at night requires specific driving skills and consequently accidents are severe at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa.

programme.title: Long Beach California
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Close Proximity S1 - "Long Beach California"
programme.desc: Matt Field and his and his solid team of experts head down to Long Beach, California to begin the Formula Drift Championship series.

programme.title: Copenhagen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Running the World S1 - "Copenhagen"
programme.desc: Max and Benj Cave travel to Copenhagen to meet up with a local free runner and undertake an epic run of Tivoli Gardens.

programme.title: Frozen Fire
programme.desc: When a report of an illegal buck surfaces Warden Joe Kambic goes to work to find the shooters. Things heat up for Warden Rick Smauch when he responds to a fire, and Bryan Golie fights the winter weather just to patrol his area.

programme.title: River Rescue
programme.desc: Drownings happen every Summer on Montanas rivers and lakes. Region 1 Warden Chris Crane steps in to save a kayaker while Region 2 Wardens catch friends fishing in the wrong spot.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Something is killing deer in the Missoula Valley and it has FWP working overtime to find the culprit.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: Kay Nambiar and the team investigate paranormal activity in London’s Ragged School and abandoned Woolwich Arsenal.

programme.title: Hastings
programme.desc: The team investigate paranormal activity in Hastings where Ian Lawman makes contact with the spirit of the notorious devil worshipper Aleister Crowley.

programme.title: Harwich
programme.desc: Kay Nambiar and the team are in Harwich, South East England to investigate a pair of haunted lighthouses capturing ghostly orbs on their CCTV cameras.

programme.title: Shelly
programme.desc: A neglected 1981 Porsche 911 SC is brought back to life and restored to its original factory specifications.

programme.title: Cabriolet
programme.desc: A ruined and rested family heirloom 1962 Mercedes Benz 220 SE Cabriolet gets a restoration modification with a new Mercedes engine and a new interior with heated seats.

programme.title: The 3.5
programme.desc: A rare 1971 Mercedes Benz 280 SE 3.5 Coupe gets restored to its original specifications.

programme.title: Episode Nine
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Nine"
programme.desc: Nik experiences Mercedes-Benzs concept for Avatar 2. Both Nik and Mike unveil top-performing cars for value. Nik reviews the 2021 Kia Telluride and 2021 Lexus IS. Mike introduces the Ford Mach-E 1400.

programme.title: Episode Ten
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Ten"
programme.desc: Nik praises the 2021 Audi e-tron Sportback. Mike talks about the return of the coupe SUV with the Infiniti QX55. Nik tests the Lamborghini Huracan EVO and explores the 2021 hybrid Wrangler 4XE.

programme.title: Episode Eleven
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Eleven"
programme.desc: Nik explores the Mazda CX30 Turbo and Toyota 4Runner. He highlights the 2022 VW IDA and off-roads in the Hyundai Santa Cruz. Hopes are high for the Lexus LF-Z Concept Electric.

programme.title: Desperate Times
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Desperate Times"
programme.desc: Island Air drops off a group of desperate hunters in the heart of the bush as a deep freeze hits Kodiak.

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Risky Business"
programme.desc: Pilot Peter Rosendahl combats gale force wind and choppy seas while taxing a group of hunters to a floating lodge.

programme.title: Training Day
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Training Day"
programme.desc: New pilots are put to the test to see if they have what it takes to fly for Island Air.

programme.title: To Hell and Back
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "To Hell and Back"
programme.desc: Last years champion, Erik Miller defends his title. While 2nd place finisher, Jason Scherer, will be one of the many top challengers aiming to beat him.

programme.title: Finding the Line
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "Finding the Line"
programme.desc: We follow Shannon Campbell, the first 3-time champion of the King of the Hammers. But his kids, also young drivers, push their dad to the brink of his limits.

programme.title: Bringing Out The Big Guns
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "Bringing Out The Big Guns"
programme.desc: Its mud, sweat, and gears as drivers battle it out in the toughest Ultra 4 race yet.

programme.title: Finding Nirvana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Morbidelli Rising S1 - "Finding Nirvana"
programme.desc: How does a rider feel moments before the race that they have spent their life preparing for? Franco Morbidelli begins his first MOTOGP race weekend in Qatar.

programme.title: Chasing Happy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Morbidelli Rising S1 - "Chasing Happy"
programme.desc: The VR46 MotoRanch track created by Valentino Rossi as a place to fine tune the riding skills of a lucky few, is notoriously hard to access - until now.

programme.title: A Dangerous Game
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Morbidelli Rising S1 - "A Dangerous Game"
programme.desc: There’s danger on the track at the years biggest race, Mugello. Franco battles to focus on his goal of ‘Rookie of the Year’ while around him his team implodes.

programme.title: So Near, So Far
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Inside Moto S1 - "So Near, So Far"
programme.desc: We reveal how Maverick and Alvaro face the loneliness of being Champions: Maverick lets go of family support while for Alvaro Bautista, family is the key.

programme.title: Race Against or Share With?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Inside Moto S1 - "Race Against or Share With?"
programme.desc: We discover the relationship between Brad and Darryn Binder, 2 brothers who race against each other on motorcycle tracks around the world.

programme.title: All for Bike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Inside Moto S1 - "All for Bike"
programme.desc: Sacrifices are found on the path to success: from Yonny Hernandez’s self-exile, to the serious injuries that Doctor Villamor has to treat.

programme.title: Luke Woodham v Adam Elder
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Luke Woodham v Adam Elder"
programme.desc: 3-time rear wheel drive Gymkhana Grid champion Luke Woodham is defending for a fourth title. His biggest rival Adam Elder is doing everything he can to win.

programme.title: Great 8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Great 8"
programme.desc: Road to Gymkhana Grid: 100% pure adrenalin! Profiling 8 of the sport’s top drivers, we see into their minds and the mental preparation needed to compete.

programme.title: Baptism by Fire
programme.sub-title: S11 : E11 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Baptism by Fire"
programme.desc: The Pheonix Cuda, the car that survived a deadly explosion, is ready for its purification. Its rust and metal are seared away to expose its hidden sins. Thus begins the first stage of its monumental rebirth.

programme.title: Parking In-Violetion
programme.sub-title: S11 : E12 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Parking In-Violetion"
programme.desc: In our second to last episode of the season, the ghouls shift into high gear to make progress on our In-Violet 1971 Cuda Convertible. And work begins on our SEMA 2019 build!

programme.title: Craig Hutto
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Fight to Survive S1 - "Craig Hutto"
programme.desc: A family fishing trip turns into a bloody nightmare and leaves Craig Hutto fighting for his life.

programme.title: Ron Smith Story
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Fight to Survive S1 - "Ron Smith Story"
programme.desc: This week, its the true story of Ron Smiths encounter with a fearless deer that attacked both him and his nephew, Arik, while out fishing.

programme.title: Prayer Point 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Prayer Point 2"
programme.desc: On the third day of river travel, the crew desperately seeks a hunting camp to lift morale and pursue the giant bull. Frustration mounts as the brothers confess uncertainty for the first time.

programme.title: King of the Tundra
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "King of the Tundra"
programme.desc: Casey downs a huge bull near the river. Another bull approaches, leading to a tense standoff across the river.

programme.title: Sweet Collisions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Sweet Planet S1 - "Sweet Collisions"
programme.desc: This episode of "Sweet Collisions" focuses on the complexity and nuances brought about by the mixing and clashing of different flavors in the process of making sweets, including the interplay of sweet, sour and spicy tastes.

programme.title: Thailand
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 The Travel Bug S5 - "Thailand"
programme.desc: To kick the series off Morgan is heading to where he first got his taste for travel – Thailand. Here he explores the chaos of Bangkok and Phuket, while also checking out their surrounds.

programme.title: Thailand/Cambodia
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 The Travel Bug S5 - "Thailand/Cambodia"
programme.desc: In this episode Morgan leaves Phuket and heads to Kho Samui, for a bit of fun in the sun and some exploring of the local attractions. From there he jumps on a flight to Cambodia and begins unearthing this culturally rich and beautiful country.

programme.title: Houston
programme.desc: Jamie Hancock was raised in Houston’s South Park area, a place notorious for gang violence, but also where hip hop artists created a new sound. Today, a new positive message is being created by people like Jamie through music.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Streets S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Los Angeles based electronic music producer and DJ Moe Espinosa, aka Drumcell, has created sonic soundscapes which tell cinematic stories with his music. Moe has always tried to avoid commercialism and by having a vision that remains independent.

programme.title: Goma, Congo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Goma, Congo"
programme.desc: Bboy Junior is going back where he was born, The Democratic Republic of Congo. World champion Shigekix will join him, visiting Africa for the first time. Together they will explore the dance culture in the city of Goma.

programme.title: Sao Paulo, Brazil
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Sao Paulo, Brazil"
programme.desc: Russian Bgirl Kastet is visiting Sao Paulo, the home of Bboy Neguin. Together they will explore the dance, breaking and hip hop culture in the streets of Sao Paulo. Meeting up with legends and learning Capoeira, Jiu Jitsu and Passinho.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: DJ-producer Carly Foxx travels to the clubbing capital of the world to inspire her music track and discovers Ibiza’s alternative spiritual side.

programme.title: Quebec
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travels with Darley S1 - "Quebec"
programme.desc: Explore Quebec City, the Eastern Townships and Montreal with host Darley Newman. Dive into the New France Festival and First Nations culture in Quebec City, nature and adventure cycling through the treetops in the Eastern Townships.

programme.title: Lesbos
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Lesbos"
programme.desc: In this episode Mia Zoi heads south-east, across to the island of Lesbos. Like any Greek island, it has a truly unique personality. It’s the third biggest island in the nation, with a rich and varied landscape.

programme.title: The Ice Hotel V Barbados
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jet Set S1 - "The Ice Hotel V Barbados"
programme.desc: In freezing temperatures Gill attempts a Jet Set Victory by sculpting her very own ice cat. Unfortunately it leaves Dave feeling rather scared. Richard attempts to heat up the competition from the Caribbean island of Barbados.

programme.title: Chiang Mai V Venice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Jet Set S1 - "Chiang Mai V Venice"
programme.desc: Richard immerses himself in Thai culture, picking his own rice, learning to cook Thai style with a local top chef and paying a visit to a retired elephant park. While Gill heads to the Italian city of Venice, for a cheeky Bellini in Harry’s Bar.

programme.title: Eze (France) V Stockholm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Jet Set S1 - "Eze (France) V Stockholm"
programme.desc: From the French Riviera, Richard attempts to win the episode from his hotel, where every house in the town is actually a hotel suite. Meanwhile Gill tours the Swedish capital of Stockholm, sailing around the archipelago.

programme.title: Amboise (The Loire) and Grenada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Amboise (The Loire) and Grenada"
programme.desc: Culture and pampering, fine wines and the final resting place of Leonardo da Vinci in the Loire Valley in France and the ultimate relaxing spa break in Grenada.

programme.title: Venice and Northern Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Venice and Northern Ireland"
programme.desc: This time The Luxury Travel Show visits Venice, one of Europe’s most iconic and enchanting cities as well as Northern Ireland, with a haunted hotel and a trip to where some of HBO’s ‘Games of Thrones’ series was filmed.

programme.title: Barbados and Lake Como
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Barbados and Lake Como"
programme.desc: From Barbados to Lake Como this episode is all about fabulous food and famous visitors.

programme.title: Liguria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Liguria"
programme.desc: Liguria is more than just a glamorous stretch of Riviera coastline. Giorgio the chef cooks for us and we pop into a local sweet shop; then further still to the towers of Albenga and the postcard views of Cervo.

programme.title: Toscana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Toscana"
programme.desc: In this episode we will drive through the UNESCO-protected Val d’Orcia to find a different Tuscany. In lieu of Chianti we will visit the eco-friendly Salcheto winery in the area’s great Montepulciano region.

programme.title: Umbria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Umbria"
programme.desc: In this episode we shall have a brief stop at the tallest man-made waterfall in Europe before exploring some of the area’s towns. Orvieto, with its medieval centre and underground Etruscan ruins sets the stage.

programme.title: Lesbos, Psara and Chios
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Lesbos, Psara and Chios"
programme.desc: Peter makes his way to the capital of Lesvos, Mitlini. It’s quite the contrast to the rest of the island. From there he’s headed south, where he briefly visits the remote island of Psara, before making his way to Chios, the birthplace of Homer.

programme.title: Chios and Innousses
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Chios and Innousses"
programme.desc: Peter shows us the sites, sounds and tastes of Chios. Then we cruise north to Inousses, thats been called the cradle of the Greek shipping fortunes.

programme.title: Syros
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Syros"
programme.desc: The Western Cyclades is a region of the Mediterranean that doesn’t often have a light shined on it, which is all the more reason he was keen to check it out. The first port of call is Syros.

programme.title: Cambodia/Japan
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 The Travel Bug S5 - "Cambodia/Japan"
programme.desc: Continuing his adventure in Cambodia, the Travel Bug finds himself in the rural parts of the country before heading to Siem Reap and the chaos of the city. He then flies to Japan to start a couple of weeks traversing the Land of the Rising Sun.

programme.title: Japan (Takayama to Kanazawa)
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 The Travel Bug S5 - "Japan (Takayama to Kanazawa)"
programme.desc: Morgan visits one of Japan’s biggest festivals in the beautiful city of Takayama. Here he gets a taste of the old world before exploring the wilderness of the country’s interior and visits places few westerners ever explore.

programme.title: Japan (Kanazawa to Osaka)
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 The Travel Bug S5 - "Japan (Kanazawa to Osaka)"
programme.desc: Morgan continues his way through Japan, exploring some of the history and culture that makes this one of the lost fascinating places on the planet. Visiting the stunning Kenrouken Garden and Samurai area of Kanazawa, before heading to Osaka.

programme.title: The First Wall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "The First Wall"
programme.desc: Ash’s journey along the Great Wall of China begins at the furthest point to the East, at an ancient section known as the Chu Great Wall. After that, Ash heads to the Shaolin Temple in Dengfeng City, to learn some of their ancient practices.

programme.title: Underwater
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Underwater"
programme.desc: Starting at Old Dragon’s Head, Ash continues west to meet a Wall Protector who has dedicated his life to preserving this iconic monument, before gearing up for an unexpected adventure: scuba diving the ruins of the Great Wall of China.

programme.title: Mad Max museum
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Mad Max museum"
programme.desc: Scotty visits the Mad Max museum in Silverton and David treks to one of Indonesias spectacular sleeping giants

programme.title: Komodo dragon
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Komodo dragon"
programme.desc: David gets close but not too close to the Komodo dragon and I try out a local delicacy.

programme.title: Thailand
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Thailand"
programme.desc: Scotty makes a new friend in Thailand and I take to the stage in a theatrical spectacular in China.

programme.title: Barcelona V Lake Como
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Jet Set S1 - "Barcelona V Lake Como"
programme.desc: Both Richard and Gill battle it out with their list of whose who, responsible for putting their locations, Barcelona and Lake Como on the world map.

programme.title: London V Bangkok
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Jet Set S1 - "London V Bangkok"
programme.desc: London versus Bangkok. Helicopter versus tuck tuck. With so much to see and do in each capital city whose method of transport will win Dave’s seal of approval?

programme.title: The Loire V Anuradhapura (Sri Lanka)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Jet Set S1 - "The Loire V Anuradhapura (Sri Lanka)"
programme.desc: Gill embarks on more than a wine tasting tour of France as Amboise is also the former residence of the French royal family. Meanwhile Richard embarks on his own historical tour of Sri Lanka, visiting some the islands ancient temples and ruins.

programme.title: İstanbul, Antalya and the TurkAegean Coast in Turkiye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travels with Darley S1 - "İstanbul, Antalya and the TurkAegean Coast in Turkiye"
programme.desc: Explore history, culture and cuisine in İstanbul, Antalya and along Turkiye’s Aegean Coast. See the top sights in İstanbul and enjoy a behind the scenes look at old and new architecture and archeological sites.

programme.title: The First Wall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "The First Wall"
programme.desc: Ash’s journey along the Great Wall of China begins at the furthest point to the East, at an ancient section known as the Chu Great Wall. After that, Ash heads to the Shaolin Temple in Dengfeng City, to learn some of their ancient practices.

programme.title: Underwater
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Underwater"
programme.desc: Starting at Old Dragon’s Head, Ash continues west to meet a Wall Protector who has dedicated his life to preserving this iconic monument, before gearing up for an unexpected adventure: scuba diving the ruins of the Great Wall of China.

programme.title: End of the Season
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "End of the Season"
programme.desc: The best of the big wave surfing community wrap up an amazing El Nino season with the XXL Big Wave Awards in Anaheim, California.

programme.title: Oakland
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 A Simple Path S3 - "Oakland"
programme.desc: Yann celebrates Oaklands skateboarding cultures diversity. He visits Unity Skate Shop and Lower Grand Radio. He explores Town Park with K-Dub, meets Jai and the Skate Like a Girl crew. Then skates Marbies mini ramp, the hook and a dragon.

programme.title: LA County
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 A Simple Path S3 - "LA County"
programme.desc: Yann explores LA County skateboard communities, visiting Gunters handmade leather goods workshop, Open Gallery, Justins recycled skateboard wood shop, Tito from Local Hearts Foundation, and Eunice a vlogger, emphasizing community and creativity.

programme.title: Best of ep. 7 to 11
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 7 to 11"
programme.desc: In this episode the boys look back over their time spent in Portugal India Mexico Gran Canaria and Jamaica.

programme.title: Chile: Chiloe
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: MONACO and VENICE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel in Style S1 - "MONACO and VENICE"
programme.desc: Monaco is the home of extravagance, but then let’s not forget the legendary Hotel Cipriani in the wonderful city Venice that is also featured in this glitzy luxury extravaganza.

programme.title: SUPERYACHTS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel in Style S1 - "SUPERYACHTS"
programme.desc: This glitzy adventure starts in the idyllic town Portofino -Italy, then our super-yacht moors offshore Monaco where we board a privately owned 212 ft, 80 million euro super yacht – The White Rose of Drachs.

programme.title: The Animals of Oudtshoorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Animals of Oudtshoorn"
programme.desc: Xander starts his day by receiving a surprising phone call from Adam before heading to Chandelier Game Lodge to visit Africa’s most exquisite animals.

programme.title: Creations of Prins Albert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Creations of Prins Albert"
programme.desc: Despite unforeseen travel complications, Xander travels through a picturesque mountain pass to Prince Albert to enjoy the olive farms and other specialties the town has to offer.

programme.title: The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein"
programme.desc: With one final trip ahead of them, Xander and his crew make their way from the scorching desert of Lindbergh to the haunted ghost town of Matjiesfontein.

programme.title: Sango Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Sango Lodge"
programme.desc: Craig joins Kristina at Sango Lodge in the heart of the Save Valley Conservancy where they explore the vast, rugged wilderness. Kristina joins Bryce and his anti-poaching team as they demonstrate the effectiveness of the anti-poaching dog unit.

programme.title: Zam Expeditions and Kangya Pan Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Zam Expeditions and Kangya Pan Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina travels to Mana Pools to experience the wilderness in the dry season. Her guide, Cloud, takes her on an expedition to find lion cubs and wild dog puppies. Richard guides Kristina into her closest encounter yet with a wild bull elephant.

programme.title: Camp Amalinda
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Camp Amalinda"
programme.desc: Kristina journeys to Camp Amalinda. Her guide, Dardley, shares some of the history of this World Heritage Site and intriguing rock paintings. They track white rhino on foot and she learns about the distinctive rock formations.

programme.title: Trust Me!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Trust Me!"
programme.desc: Jason has attempted to climb the Grand Teton, located in Wyoming, three times before the couples adventure out west. Will the fourth time be a charm, or will lifes unplanned moments present even greater challenges than Jason anticipated?

programme.title: Hells Revenge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Hells Revenge"
programme.desc: After climbing the Grand Teton, the couple head to Utah where a change of plans has them trading in their climbing shoes for an ATV. They take on Hells Revenge, a 4x4 trail only recommended for extremely experienced drivers...which they are not.

programme.title: Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!"
programme.desc: Hiking and canyoneering are a nice break from strenuous mountaineering, but its hard to relax when a lack of water and mountain lions are part of the equation. Tayler and Jason both need a break...but is the break they need actually from each other?

programme.title: Charleroi
programme.desc: Local exploring in industrial Charleroi, brings Cody to abandoned factories and an unknown spot full of colorful graffiti. An old casino awaits to be explored.

programme.title: Nicosia
programme.desc: Josh is in Cyprus for a local exploring adventure across the island on a roadtrip from Nicosia to an abandoned amusement park, an asbestos mine and a shipwreck.

programme.title: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Epic Exploring S2 - "New Orleans"
programme.desc: Cody is with Lexi Limitless in the ‘Big Easy’ to explore New Orleans, visiting an abandoned Charity Hospital before meeting Brutus, the giant alligator.

programme.title: Alpaca
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Alpaca"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Peru with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Sheep
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Sheep"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Bulgaria with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Donkey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel with a Goat S1 - "Donkey"
programme.desc: Two foodies travel through Sicily with an animal. Will they decide to have the animal slaughtered after spending three days together with it?

programme.title: Back to where it all started
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Roads End S1 - "Back to where it all started"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave are reaching the end of their incredible journey and must go back to where it all started Buenos Aires.

programme.title: 6000 km
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Roads End S1 - "6000 km"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave make a toast to their recently finished trip rough riding across Argentina.

programme.title: Re-live
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave re-live some more of the highlights from their incredible 6000km journey.

programme.title: Australian Islands and Abu Dhabi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Australian Islands and Abu Dhabi"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris finds an Australian island with some unusual locals, finds out how fast he can go in futuristic Abu Dhabi, tags along on an extreme four wheel drive day trip and finds out why the Color Run is taking over the world!

programme.title: Borneo
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Borneo"
programme.desc: Chris travels to the stunning rainforests of Borneo, where he encounters endangered Orangutans and the extremely rare pygmy elephant.

programme.title: The Rockies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "The Rockies"
programme.desc: Chris sets out to learn about Canadian Wolf dogs, takes a trip on the world famous Rocky Mountaineer, and strikes out in search of black bears.

programme.title: The Berg River
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Berg River"
programme.desc: While Xander gets an up-close look at the tranquil and isolated Kersefontein Farm, Adam becomes a true armchair adventurer, wishing he was experiencing anything besides snowy Canadian weather.

programme.title: The Majestic Cederberg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Majestic Cederberg"
programme.desc: When Adam’s power goes out in Winnipeg, he decides to spend the day building a snow fort. Meanwhile, Xander and his crew take a trip through Cederberg.

programme.title: From Elands to Lamberts Bay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Elands to Lamberts Bay"
programme.desc: Up next, Xander and his team stop to surf the legendary left break at Elands Bay. After experiencing the peace and tranquility of the ocean with South African locals, Xander and his team hit a snag in their journey.

programme.title: Caving In
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "Caving In"
programme.desc: Moving the leadwood tree is proving to be nerve wracking for Amanda. Back at the building site, the thatch is too heavy for the wooden frames and as a result its bending the door frames. Amanda’s kids are in Zimbabwe for the school holidays.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Competition"
programme.desc: Bruce visits Victoria Falls Safari Lodge, to check out the competition and what is on their menu. The Lodge chef shows him how to make their signature Mopane worm dish. At the house, they have a new unwanted visitor, a Mozambican Spitting Cobra.

programme.title: The Elephant In The Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Zambezi Crescent S1 - "The Elephant In The Room"
programme.desc: Lyndal and Amanda are at a local market buying some wooden tables for the lodge as well as a few wood statues. Lyndal takes a quiet time out and goes to visit the Victoria Falls. Amanda, Bruce and Mark head into town for a farewell dinner for Bruce.

programme.title: Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge"
programme.desc: Dardley joins Kristina at Ivory Lodge on the edge of Hwange National Park where her predator sightings just keep getting better. They get unbelievably close to wild cheetah and witness a cheetah hunt. Do the cheetah succeed in what they were after?

programme.title: Kavinga Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Kavinga Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina’s guide, Andy, treats her to wonderful riverbed drives and wild encounters on foot. An eventful night drive leads them into a potential battle as a coalition of 3 foreign male lions step into the resident king’s territory!

programme.title: The Hide Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "The Hide Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina is back with Sean and hosted at the Hide Safari Camp in Hwange National Park at their driest period. At night, they discover an unexpected leopard kill and spend time with a hungry pride as they study the menu.

programme.title: Volcan Madera, Nicaragua
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Volcan Madera, Nicaragua"
programme.desc: The brothers attain their goal of riding motorcycles to the heart of Nicaragua, through the jungle to the isolated beaches of the Pacific coast and back inland: through Spanish-colonial towns, local villages and the huge volcanic island of Ometepe.

programme.title: Yorkshire Dales, England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Yorkshire Dales, England"
programme.desc: Imagine a 26-pub, 7-day, 60-mile pub-crawl! Doing a traditional ‘ramble’ through the stunning Yorkshire Dales region of northern England, the brother’s stride through the moors and dales and peaks and valleys - legs and livers intact.

programme.title: Vietnam - Heart of Hanoi part 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Maximum Foodie S2 - "Vietnam - Heart of Hanoi part 1"
programme.desc: Vietnam offers travelers a wide range of exotic as well as simple homegrown grub. Sashi rolls into town with no knowledge of Vietnamese cuisine, and he gets an indepth street food 101 tour of the city. From learning about haute Franco-Vietnamese cuisine with the city’s best French chefs, to a simple and honest bowl of pho. In this episode, Sashi uncovers the bustling city of Hanoi and all its trappings. Secret alleyways leading to decades old cafes offering famous brews like egg coffee; to iconic places that serve French style baguettes and everything in between!

programme.title: Vietnam - Heart of Hanoi part 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Maximum Foodie S2 - "Vietnam - Heart of Hanoi part 2"
programme.desc: Vietnam offers travelers a wide range of exotic as well as simple homegrown grub. Sashi rolls into town with no knowledge of Vietnamese cuisine, and he gets an indepth street food 101 tour of the city. From learning about haute Franco-Vietnamese cuisine with the city’s best French chefs, to a simple and honest bowl of pho. In this episode, Sashi uncovers the bustling city of Hanoi and all its trappings. Secret alleyways leading to decades old cafes offering famous brews like egg coffee; to iconic places that serve French style baguettes and everything in between!

programme.title: Nut
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Nut"
programme.desc: Join Lauren on a culinary adventure with various nuts as she discovers their potential beyond snacking and incorporates them into Italian and Balinese recipes like Cashew cheese, mouthwatering Cabonara and more delightful flavors.

programme.title: Coconut
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Coconut"
programme.desc: Explore the boundless potential of coconuts with Lauren as she reinvents a calamari dish using coconut flesh, offering a taste experience that will leave you in awe and redefine your culinary perceptions.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.
