programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tempers flare up when two agitated inmates share a cell. An intoxicated woman gives officers a hard time in booking, and a hustler facing DUI charges wants to change his ways.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman finds herself in jail after telling police she was frightened by a monkey mask. An intoxicate man feels an officer is very special. During a search, an officer finds contraband in a pack of cigarettes that has big consequences to an inmate. A young man says his mom tried to pepper spray him over his brother’s drug use while officers discover the truth to his arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: One man booked for intoxication is placed in a sobering cell for being uncooperative. An aggrieved woman claims Animal Control took her “baby.” A man tells officers he is a “child of God” and actor.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An arrested man is caught on camera making a run for freedom. An addict returns to jail and tells officers that meth is controlling his mind. Humility may be the key for one man to quit his life of crime. A shoplifter calls 9-1-1 to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A young father pulls a desperate double robbery to make ends meet. A routine shakedown gets deadly when officers uncover alarming contraband. An inmate plays innocent about her criminal past until confronted by officers. An antsy woman’s brazen behavior tests the patience of officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In San Diego, CA an officer grapples with a combative detainee. In Portland, OR six party goers are taken into custody. In Fort Worth, TX a high-risk inmate manages to get the key to his handcuffs.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A drug dealers mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: A Haunted House 2
programme.desc: Tassa hulvattomassa jatko-osassa Marlon Wayans palaa Malcolmina, joka saatuaan entisen demoninsa karkotettua aloittaa uuden elaman uuden tyttoystavansa ja taman kahden lapsen kanssa. Muutettuaan unelmakotiinsa Malcolmia vaivaavat jalleen oudot paranormaalit tapahtumat, eika talla kertaa vain talo ole kummitusten asuttama! Jamie Pressly, Cedric the Entertainer ja Essence Atkins ovat myos mukana.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva komedia mallikansalaisesta Steven Russellista (JIM CARREY), jonka radikaalilla elamanmuutoksella on hintansa. Patologisen valehtelijan munaukset vievat miehen suoraan kaapista hakkiin, kun han jaa luksuselamansa rahoittamiseen kehitetyista superhuijauksista kiinni rysan paalta. Vankilassa Stevenin yllattaa kuitenkin takaapain rynniva rakkaus, jota huijarin taipumukset ja poliisien pamput kuitenkin vaikeuttavat. Stevenilla on kuitenkin sairaita suunnitelmia rakastuneen parin saattamiseksi jalleen yhteen...

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: Joukko Star Wars -faneja matkustaa Skywalker Ranchille varastaakseen kopion elokuvasta "The Phantom Menace," jotta heidan kuolemansairas ystavansa ehtisi nahda sen ennen sen ensi-iltaa, joka on vasta usean kuukauden paasta.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: The Details
programme.desc: Jeffin (Tobey Maguire) ja Nealyn (Elizabeth Banks) taydellinen elama viehattavassa esikaupungissa soljuu onnellisesti uomissaan. Idylli kaatuu kuitenkin hetkessa kun karvainen pesukarhuperhe muuttaa heidan takapihalleen turmelemaan jarjestysta. Pahimman sekasorron saa kuitenkin aikaan talon isanta Jeff, jonka pakkomielteeksi muodostuu havittaa tuholaiset keinolla milla hyvansa. Karvapallot vs. mies taistelu ja flirttailu naapurin Lilan (Laura Linney) kanssa johtavat lopulta armottomaan sahlaykseen uskottomuuteen, kiristykseen ja jopa elinten luovutukseen...

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Movie 43
programme.desc: Sulje silmat ja peita korvat! Sekaisin Marista- ja Nuija ja tosinuija -elokuvista tuttu Peter Farrelly on kerannyt mielettoman nayttelijakaartin elokuvaan, jossa mikaan ei ole pyhaa.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Kate antaa 30-vuotispaivan aattonaan Evielle ja Charlielle luvan jarjestaa itselleen pirskeet. Juhlista sukeutuu kuitenkin menneisyytta ja nykyisyytta sekoitteleva villi peli, ja tilanne riistaytyy kaikkien kasista.

programme.title: The Happytime Murders
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthyn tahdittama raavittoman hilliton komedia Elokuva sijoittuu Los Angelesin laitamille, jossa nuket ja ihmiset elavat rinta rinnan. Kaksi erimielista etsivaa, toinen ihminen, toinen nukke, joutuvat tyoskentelemaan yhdessa selvittaakseen kuka murhaa julmasti suositun The Happytime Gang -nukkeshow’n entisia tahtia.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: PT-valmentajat (Cobie Smulders ja Guy Pearce) saavat tehtavakseen saada uusrikas ja hyvin motivoitumaton asiakas (Kevin Corrigan) kuntoon. Pian tassa fiksussa ja hauskassa rakkautta ja ruumiinkuntoa kasittelevassa komediassa naiden kolmen elama ammatti- ja yksityiselama sotkeutuu umpisolmuun.

programme.title: Barbershop: The Next Cut
programme.desc: Viimeisesta tapaamisestamme Calvinin parturiliikkeessa on kulunut yli 10 vuotta. Calvin ja hanen pitkaaikainen tiiminsa ovat yha siella, mutta liike on kokenut suuria muutoksia. Huomattavin muutos on, etta aiemmin miesvaltainen turvapaikkamme on nyt sekakayttoinen.

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: Joukko Star Wars -faneja matkustaa Skywalker Ranchille varastaakseen kopion elokuvasta "The Phantom Menace," jotta heidan kuolemansairas ystavansa ehtisi nahda sen ennen sen ensi-iltaa, joka on vasta usean kuukauden paasta.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Abit Michael ja Matty ovat olleet parhaita ystavia kolmannelta luokalta saakka. He ovat yha neitsyita ja tekevat sopimuksen, etta auttavat toisiaan saamaan seksia ennen abitansseja – mutta heidan missionsa saa yllattavan kaanteen, kun Matt ilmoittaa olevansa homo.

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Hell Town
programme.desc: In Hell Town (aka Born to the West) John Wayne is back in the saddle as two-fisted Dare Rudd, a roaming cowhand trying to prove he can win a womans love and outwit a crooked saloon owner. This exciting B-movie from Paramount Pictures was based on a novel by western writer Zane Grey. With a wild and wooly cast that includes Johnny Mack Brown, Marsha Hunt, Monte Blue, and Lucian Littlefield, director Charles Barton (Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein) gives us a tale of romance, action, and high stakes gambling!

programme.title: Range War
programme.desc: William Boyd returns in the 25th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. This time Hopalong goes undercover to expose a group of ranchers who are interfering with the building of a new railroad. Also, look for Russell Hayden as Lucky Jenkins, and Britt Wood as Speedy McGinnis. Its a great, action-packed adventure from director Leslie Selander (Flight to Mars, Riders of the Range), and further proof that no one pushes Hoppy around and gets away with it!

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders!

programme.title: Valley of Vengeance
programme.desc: LUST FOR GOLD BROUGHT MASSACRE TO HUNDREDS! Death Rode the Plains! Directed by Sam Newfield and starring Buster Crabbe (Flash Gordon) and Al St. John, Valley of Vengeance opens with Billy Carson (Crabbe) shooting two affluential town officials after they - and a band of outlaws - had murdered his and Fuzzys (St. John) parents years earlier. Arrested for the shootings, Billy tells the story of the outlaws killing his parents and the events that led to his shooting the town officials. Will Billy be able to prove his innocence and bring and end to the corrupted officials?

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barretts gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are sent to Oklahoma to investigate a hanging judge. Stoneys plan to go undercover backfires when he is framed for murder himself. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are assigned to investigate reports of an impostor posing as a U.S. Secret Service agent operating in Washington territory. In the guise of a government law officer, the man is shutting down all rivals of a saloon keepers operating a crooked gambling establishment. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. Originally aired in 1952 on NBC.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kates Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie head to Bannack, Montana where they face off against the corrupt sheriff Henry Plummer.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also starring John Dehner, Lane Bradford, and Bill kennedy. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955 .(This episode also features Kristine Miller, who would become a semi-regular in the series.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is mistaken as the girlfriend of criminal Bill Longley at the circus. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also starring Douglas Kennedy, Marlo Dwyer, and Harry Hayden. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954..Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, a Texas Ranger is shot down in cold blood. Determined to bring the killer to justice, the Judge and Jeff turn their focus on Curly, but with a lack of evidence the lawmen are patient until they break the case. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Luck O The Irish
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Roy and Taggart are intrigued by the arrival of Pat OHara and his much younger wife Kate. Pats fondess for drink and gambling has him involved with the towns rowdies who are eying his beautiful bride. The Judge helps sort things out.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a Tuscarawas man tries to incite war against the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help when tensions rise between the Iroquois and the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights take a young boy to the Ponderosa after the death of his mother. Hoss is the only one that is able to get through the boys hostility and bitterness, but, as the two begin to get close, the boys father breaks out of prison and comes to retrieve the boy.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Home in Oklahoma
programme.desc: The entire gang is here! Roy Rogers, Dale Evans, Gabby Hayes, and Trigger are all involved in a murder mystery involving the death of a wealthy ranch owner. Songs include I Wish I Was A Kid Again and Cowboy Ham and Eggs.

programme.title: Lights of Old Santa Fe
programme.desc: Roy Rogers gets involved when his buddy finds himself at odds with a rival rodeo operator. Theres plenty of singing in this musical western, plus enough action to make you realize that Roy Rogers was much more than a singing cowboy! With a cast that includes Dale Evans, George Gabby Hayes, Lloyd Corrigan, and Tom Keene, director Frank McDonald gives us a fun thrill ride through old Santa Fe. Trigger is here, too!

programme.title: The Yellow Rose of Texas
programme.desc: Fans of Roy Rogers and Dale Evans will relish this western adventure. It features no less than nine musical numbers! Songs include, The Timber Trail, Western Wonderland, Lucky Me, Unlucky You, Song of the Rover, and more. Theres even a tune partly written by Cuban bandleader Xavier Cugat! In between songs, theres a plot about a robbery, with Roy playing an insurance investigator trying to solve the riddle of the missing money.

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: John Wayne was 27 when he starred in this vintage western drama from Hollywoods Poverty Row. He plays Randy Bowers, a man wrongly jailed for murders. With help from a female friend, he breaks out of prison and sets out to find the real killers. Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons, Rustlers Paradise) directs a strong cast of familiar faces, including legendary sidekick George Gabby Hayes, Earl Dwyer, and one of the hardest ridin stuntmen turned actors, Yakima Canutt.

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Pines
programme.desc: GENE AUTRY COMES ROARING OUT OF THE SKIES...to save the forests from an outlaw lumber ring! When ex forest ranger Gene tries to interfere with a gang destroying the timberland, hes framed for cattle-poisoning and set up for a murder charge. Yet, he still has time to sing some great cowboy songs, including Its My Lazy Day, and Hair of Gold. This is Gene Autry in a slightly different role, with some great footage filmed at Big Bear Valley and San Bernardino National Forest.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: A group of disparate travelers journey together through the Southwest soon find trouble when they all get gold fever. The action and drama are heightened when they discover gold. The Tall Texan (Lloyd Bridges), is a suspected murderer in the custody of sheriff Lee J. Cobb, and now stranded in Indian territory after a Comanche attack on their stagecoach.

programme.title: Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: Gold, gangs, and the heroic fight for life! Johnny Mack Brown (Billy the Kid, Coquette) stars in this western thriller about murders going on in a mining community. Its a story full of twists, where the greed for gold is only surpassed by the struggle for life!

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidys boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and hes not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. Its a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila OConner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Arizona Thunderbolt
programme.desc: When Sue Bixby becomes his new boss, stagecoach robber Talbot reforms and goes after her rustled cattle. When he and his men are outnumbered fighting Lloyds gang, Randall rides to get circus man Mahoney and his man shooting cannon.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwrights step in to make sure hell be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adams life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwrights to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshals motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joes hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotels holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but hes not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her fathers honor after hes killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: Over the Hill Gang
programme.desc: A retired Texas Ranger and his three aging pals are hired to clean up a lawless town. Starring Walter Brennan, Edgar Buchanan, Andy Devine, Jack Elam, Gypsy Rose Lee, and Rick Nelson.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. Youll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Waynes big swinging right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Waynes...

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.desc: The clinic gets an odd employee, and Sash investigates a paralyzed coolie.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur
programme.desc: Flowing lines and an elegance that is unmatched; the 1959 Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur aims to build bridges in the companys model range; from the sporty origin of the brand to the luxury of its new owner, Rolls Royce.

programme.title: Ignition GT

programme.title: Buyers Guide

programme.title: Sold in 60 Seconds

programme.title: Petrol Heads

programme.title: The Yas Marina Story
programme.desc: The Yas Marina Circuit in Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Team X-Raid at the Dakar Rally
programme.desc: Stephane Peterhansel is the most successful driver in the history of the Dakar Rally; with the German team X-Raid, he won the 2012 and 2013 editions of this prestigious competition in a Mini Countryman.

programme.title: Special - Pikes Peak
programme.desc: For almost a century man and machine have tried to tame the mountain that is Pikes Peak. Daredevils have risked everything to try and be fastest up the 20-kilometer road that summits the rocky mountain at 4300 meters above sea level.

programme.title: Ice Action Finland
programme.desc: Former World Rally Champion Armin Schwarz is a legend behind the wheels. Now he instructs others in driving a 300 hp Subaru WRX STI rally car on the snowy and icy landscape of Finland.

programme.title: Perfect Ride

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Paris Motor Show features the automotive world of tomorrow; in 2016, Mercedes-Benz introduced their Generation EQ and Volkswagen announced the making of 20 new electrified models by 2020.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The coupe form makes cars sexy. But it is a question of faith - and in part a question of value - whether to opt for a more traditional two-door coupe, like the Mercedes E400, or its bigger brother, the CLS with four doors.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: With its GTR, Nissan hunts the established European sports car manufacturers. The car competes with the likes of the Audi R8 GT and Porsche 911 Turbo S, but is only half their price. Also Techart gets their hands on the 911 Turbo S and turns it into 620 hp Techart 911 Turbo S, while Formula 1 pilot Adrian Sutil checks out an ultimate supercar, the Pagani Huayra.

programme.desc: Featuring the Subaru BRZ, the Alfa 4C and the Porsche Cayman GT.

programme.title: Forever Is A Lie
programme.desc: Jason and Ivy are a young couple and partners in love and in crime as they get money from commiting fraudulent activities against unsuspecting victims, however things start to go wrong when jealousy seeps in and one of them takes things too far. Starring Jessica Tse, Chuddy Davidson, Dante Okere

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Kemuel
programme.desc: AMC Music Lounge returns for its sixth season bringing you some new interviews, new live performances, fun musical games, and many more from legendary and emerging artistes. New interviews with emerging and established artistes.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Khaid
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Boss Lady
programme.desc: What happens when a successful woman who runs her own business falls in love with her newly married employee? Is she willing to do what it takes to get what she wants? Or will life make it easier for her?

programme.title: Goodbye Yesterday
programme.desc: A man turns to his ex-lover for help when he finds out that his daughter needs life-saving surgery after falling ill.

programme.title: Delusion
programme.desc: Heavily pregnant Brenda finds herself in a conundrum when Felix is in an accident and suffering from amnesia. Things start to look better for her when it appears he remembers only her but this causes problems in his family and they cannot accept his new condition.

programme.title: The Three Brides
programme.desc: Kayode loves women as much as he loves to lie about how much money he has. Now, he has become the most eligible bachelor in town and women want to keep him by all means. Unaware of kayode’s true pocket status, the women fight over maintaining their position in kayode’s life. Empowered by their charms, the women get kayode to fall in love with all three of them at the same time. But is kayode the man these women truly want to be with?

programme.title: Indecent Affair
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a womans controlling husband convinces her to pose as his cousin at a work event so his philandering boss can seduce her, the consequences are not only dire, but they also impose on everyone a journey of self discovery.

programme.title: Just One Call Away
programme.desc: A staunch believer returns from a 15-day business trip and exhibits symptoms of COVID-19. His pregnant wife, Kemi suspects he may have been exposed to the virus and insists they call NCDC to get him tested. However he fears he will be taken away and never get to see his family again.

programme.title: The Hangout S4 - EP 5
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: The Hangout S4 - Ep 6
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: Composure
programme.desc: A marriage begins to suffer after the couple lose their unborn child. Things take a turn for the worse when the wife discovers her husband has been unfaithful and her mental health starts to spiral out of control.

programme.title: Rekindle
programme.desc: Kofi meets Iris, a beautiful woman during her vacation to Ghana and becomes infatuated with her, but she leaves him without leaving any information as to where she can be reached. When he goes to Nigeria to visit, he is surprised to be greeted by a familiar face claiming to be his cousin, Frank’s fiance.

programme.title: Blatant Denial
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A vehicle inspection goes wrong with Inspector Farouk and deputy Akpan. They escape the long arm of the law, but karma finds a way to get justice.

programme.title: Today Is Gone
programme.desc: A sweet relationship turns out to be not so sweet as time goes on and platonic relationships between friends turn into something more, causing all kinds of complications.

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 464
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists

programme.title: Kimberlys Nightmare
programme.desc: The upcoming wedding of a couple is in jeopardy when the groom-to-be is given a great job opportunity that would take him away from his fiancee for a long period, leading to the ultimate betrayal.

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: A woman discovers a heart-breaking secret. She plans a steamy intimate weekend with her husband, but this weekend is full of questions, anger, rage and blood. She will not stop until she gets her answers.

programme.title: Love Like Chocolate
programme.desc: Amanda and Olisa are in a perfect relationship, but Amanda dreads the idea of getting married until her most coveted job is threatened.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Rilwan Bawa-Bwari
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Emmanuel Goodnews
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Roses Are Red
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. After a successful heart surgery, Samuel wakes up a completely different man. However, his sudden interest in art, classical literature goes contrary to his previous self.

programme.title: A Dance With Mama
programme.desc: The past and present collide when young man is about to become a father for the first time and sees that some of the challenges his wife goes through appear to mirror what his mother suffered through

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Alero has dreams to be a bodyguard but stereotypes against women reduces her to be a supermarket security. Although it’s not her dream job, she is a very good at it which makes her male colleagues envious, causing them to set her up and kidnap her. While being held hostage she meets musician who was also being held by the kidnappers.

programme.title: Unfriendly Friends
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. In a world of crime, there are no brothers, merely men who have your back; Uche and Edu have each other’s backs. Following a recent scam, the duo have to lay low for a while, but when Yetunde, a girl from their past, turns up, she brings with her a measure of distraction. Both men are interested in her which causes them to fight, forgetting their relationship.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 9
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.desc: Simeon struggles in his romantic relationships due to his close friendship with his so-called business partner, Amanda.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A family is left in disarray when Ada develops a crush on her sisters, Dorcas, husband, Mike. Things get out of hand when Ada decided to take action and get Mike by any means necessary.

programme.title: Naomi
programme.desc: Naomi, a young woman from humble beginnings, takes a job as a housemaid, not realising how broken the home she will be working in is.

programme.title: Self Sentence
programme.desc: Sani, a financial auditor, promises his wife, halima, that he will allow her to work after they get married. He starts to make things difficult for her when he gets unnecessarily suspicious of halima, thinking that she is having an affair with her boss, mr. Patrick asuquo.

programme.title: Suspicion

programme.title: Perheella on Valia Joulu
programme.desc: Joulu on kaikkea muuta kuin tavallinen - kun kolme kinastelevaa sisarusta uusperheesta - eivat ole samaa mielta. Nuorin viimeistelee vuosittaista tiedeprojektiaan - ja kutsuu vahingossa joulun henkea. He heraavat ja huomaavat, etta heidan kehonsa ovat vaihtuneet, eivatka he voi muuttua takaisin, ennen kuin he oppivat viettamaan joulun yhdessa rakastavana perheena.

programme.title: A Christmas Movie Christmas
programme.desc: Sisarukset Eve ja Lacey toivovat joulua, joka olisi kuin suoraan elokuvamaailmasta. Aivan yllattaen he huomaavatkin olevansa keskella jouluelokuvaa. He heraavat satumaisessa ja taydellisessa ”Joulukaupungissa”, jossa on taydellinen joulu ja jossa kaikki on vain aivan taydellista. Mita enemman sisarukset tutkivat kaikkea jouluun liittyvaa, sita enemman he tajuavat, etta taydellisyys ei ehka olekaan perinteisen joulun oikea tarkoitus. Ehka onkin olemassa toisenlainen taika, johon kuuluvat palaneet piparkakut ja kuivunut joulukinkku…?

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: Cooperien iso perhe kokoontuu viettamaan joulua yhdessa, mutta perinteisia kuvioita sotkevat yllatysvieraat.

programme.title: Maanviljelija ja Belle Pelastavat Joulumaan
programme.desc: Kun kuuluisa malli palaa pikkukaupunkiinsa juuri ennen joulua - han tapaa lapsuudenystavansa, jolla on nyt nuori tytar ja maatila. Pian kipinat lentavat heidan valillaan - ja han alkaa oppia, etta rakkaus ja kauneus tulevat sisalta. Kaupunki on vaarassa menettaa rakkaan Joulumaan festivaalinsa. He huomaavat, etta ihmeita voi tapahtua paattavaisyydella ja uskolla.

programme.title: Joulun ihmemaa
programme.desc: Joulun aika NYC:ssa on kaikkea muuta kuin ihanaa kamppailevalle taiteilija Heidi Neillille.

programme.title: Joulukuponki
programme.desc: Entinen luistelumestari alkaa opettaa ystavansa lammella- ja jakaa "kuponkeja" houkutellakseen uusia oppilaita. Kun hanen entinen lukiorakkaansa (ja nyt kuuluisa jaakiekkoilija)- tuo veljentyttarensa tunneille, vanhat liekit syttyvat uudelleen- ja joulu on taynna uutta mahdollisuutta rakkauteen.

programme.title: Another Christmas Coincidence
programme.desc: Toisilleen tuntemattomat Alice ja Jack, joilla on taysin erilainen tausta, paatyvat sattumalta samoihin viikonloppuhaihin. He pitavat heti toisistaan, mutta Alice arkailee uutta suhdetta, koska entinen kaukosuhde paattyi ikavasti. Alice alkaa kuitenkin Olga-aidin rohkaisemana tottua vahitellen ajatukseen deittailun aloittamisesta. Uudet yhteensattumat lahentavat nuoria toisiinsa, samalla kun tielle osuu yha uusia esteita, jotka vaikeuttavat juuri alkanutta romanssia.

programme.title: Perheella on Valia Joulu
programme.desc: Joulu on kaikkea muuta kuin tavallinen - kun kolme kinastelevaa sisarusta uusperheesta - eivat ole samaa mielta. Nuorin viimeistelee vuosittaista tiedeprojektiaan - ja kutsuu vahingossa joulun henkea. He heraavat ja huomaavat, etta heidan kehonsa ovat vaihtuneet, eivatka he voi muuttua takaisin, ennen kuin he oppivat viettamaan joulun yhdessa rakastavana perheena.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys a Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea juhlistaa joulua yhdessa ystavansa ja taman maalla asuvan perheen kanssa. Nyt on parasta olla kilttina!

programme.title: Ihme Joulujarvella
programme.desc: Kun teinipoika menettaa parhaan ystavansa ja isansa joulun aikaan- han jattaa lempilajinsa jaakiekon ja hylkaa ystavansa. Kun jaakaukalo ilmestyy jaatyneelle jarvelle hanen kotinsa lahelle, han muistelee hyvia aikoja.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.

programme.title: 12 Pups of Christmas
programme.desc: Erinin miessuhteen paatyttya han aloittelee elamaansa uudessa tyossa ja uudessa kaupungissa. Mutta juuri kun han luulee paasseensa tasapainoon, han tormaa itsekeskeiseen pomoonsa Martiniin. Mies yrittaa pitaa firmaansa pystyssa ja pyytaa Erinilta apua. Hanen pitaisi juuri ennen joulua huolehtia 12 koiranpennusta, jotka ovat jaaneet toimistolle kuvaustoiden loputtua. Kun Erin ja Martin tekevat tyota yhdessa, tunteet lampenevat, ja rakkaus tulee mukaan sopivasti juuri jouluksi.

programme.title: Joulumaa
programme.desc: Joulumaa on nahnyt parempiakin paivia Glindan menehdyttya, ja Julesin taytyy tehda valtavia paatoksia.

programme.title: A Winter Princess
programme.desc: Hienon gaalan jalkeen prinsessa Carly paattaa pitaa sapattivuoden ja aloittaa unelmatyon hiihtokeskuksessa. Yksikaan uusista tyotovereista ei tieda, kuka han oikeasti on. Mutta kun kuninkaallisen suvun jasenia ilmestyy hiihtokeskukseen, salaisuutta on pian hyvin vaikea sailyttaa paljastumatta. Samalla valmistellaan keskuksen 50-vuotisjuhlia ja Carly huomaa ihastuneensa omistajan veljeen Jesseen. Carlyn taytyy tehda suuria paatoksia elamassaan ja han tuntee olevansa yha enemman ymmallaan.

programme.title: Another Christmas Coincidence
programme.desc: Toisilleen tuntemattomat Alice ja Jack, joilla on taysin erilainen tausta, paatyvat sattumalta samoihin viikonloppuhaihin. He pitavat heti toisistaan, mutta Alice arkailee uutta suhdetta, koska entinen kaukosuhde paattyi ikavasti. Alice alkaa kuitenkin Olga-aidin rohkaisemana tottua vahitellen ajatukseen deittailun aloittamisesta. Uudet yhteensattumat lahentavat nuoria toisiinsa, samalla kun tielle osuu yha uusia esteita, jotka vaikeuttavat juuri alkanutta romanssia.

programme.title: Joulun alla
programme.desc: CHRISTMAS UNDER WRAPS, esittelee Candace Cameron Buren tohtori Lauren Brunellin roolissa, joka hyvaksyy tyopaikan Alaskassa menetettyaan seka poikaystavansa etta arvostetun leikkausapurahansa, mutta saa tietaa, etta kyseessa on pieni sairaala pikkukaupungissa.

programme.title: A Merry Holiday
programme.desc: Menestyva suunnittelija Christy stressaa saadakseen ison toimeksiannon. Han saa avukseen Jonathanin, joka yrittaa koristella poikamiesasuntoaan talven ihmemaaksi tehdakseen vaikutuksen tyttoystavansa isaan. Yhteistyo alkaa huonosti, mutta pian he tajuavat, etta heidan on pakko jatkaa ja auttaa toisiaan. Mutta mita enemman he viettavat aikaa yhdessa, sita rennommin he suhtautuvat toisiinsa. Ehka yhdessa viihtyminen ei johdukaan enaa vain tyosta.

programme.title: Santa Who?
programme.desc: Oikea joulupukki putoaa reesta ja menettaa muistinsa. Han tormaa pian tympaantyneeseen TV-toimittajaan, joka on hanen ainoa toivonsa palauttaa muisti ajoissa, etta joulu voidaan pelastaa.

programme.title: A Christmas Coincidence
programme.desc: Joulu lahestyy isoin askelin, kun Paula suostuu hieman vastahakoisesti poikaystavansa kosintaan. Isoaiti Jane tuntee, ettei kaikki ole kohdallaan ja kutsuu Paulan luokseen maalle piristaakseen tyttoa. Paula vierailee laheisella viinitilalla ja tapaa sen omistajan Geryn. Sarja yhteensattumia lahentaa heita toisiinsa. Seudun yli kulkee myrsky, joka pakottaa Paulan jaamaan yoksi. Ja pian han ymmartaa, etta juuri heidat on tarkoitettu toisilleen...

programme.title: Pahkinansarkija-makeinen
programme.desc: Oli jouluaatto. Silberhausin lapset odottivat innolla juhlallisuuksien alkua. Marie ja Fritz leikkivat lastenhuoneessa, kun heidan kummisetansa Drosselmayer saapuu - ja antaa heille joululahjaksi Pahkinansarkijan. Marie nakee suuren taistelun- Pahkinansarkijan johtaman lelusotilaiden armeijan- ja Hiirikuninkaan komentaman kamalan hiiripataljoonan valilla.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: Tyoton taidemaalari Anna kamppailee taloutensa kanssa, mutta loytaa tyopaikan kirean liikemiehen Marcin henkilokohtaisena jouluostosten tekijana.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys a Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea juhlistaa joulua yhdessa ystavansa ja taman maalla asuvan perheen kanssa. Nyt on parasta olla kilttina!

programme.title: Tonttutytto Pelastaa Joulun
programme.desc: Kun New Yorkin mafia sieppaa joulupukin juuri ennen joulua- Tonttutytto, aivan tavallinen tonttu, tulee apuun. Han lyottaytyy yhteen ystavansa Saihkyn kanssa- pysayttaakseen pahikset, loytaakseen joulupukin ja pelastaakseen joulun.

programme.title: Joulukuponki
programme.desc: Entinen luistelumestari alkaa opettaa ystavansa lammella- ja jakaa "kuponkeja" houkutellakseen uusia oppilaita. Kun hanen entinen lukiorakkaansa (ja nyt kuuluisa jaakiekkoilija)- tuo veljentyttarensa tunneille, vanhat liekit syttyvat uudelleen- ja joulu on taynna uutta mahdollisuutta rakkauteen.

programme.title: Tonttumies
programme.desc: Joulupukki jattaa tontun pelastamaan Harperin perheen kurjalta joululta. Tonttu perheineen saa enemman kuin toivoi, kun lapset auttavat tonttua loytamaan voimansa - ja identiteettinsa orastavana supersankarina.

programme.title: Maanviljelija ja Belle Pelastavat Joulumaan
programme.desc: Kun kuuluisa malli palaa pikkukaupunkiinsa juuri ennen joulua - han tapaa lapsuudenystavansa, jolla on nyt nuori tytar ja maatila. Pian kipinat lentavat heidan valillaan - ja han alkaa oppia, etta rakkaus ja kauneus tulevat sisalta. Kaupunki on vaarassa menettaa rakkaan Joulumaan festivaalinsa. He huomaavat, etta ihmeita voi tapahtua paattavaisyydella ja uskolla.

programme.title: Puppy Star Christmas
programme.desc: Pup Star -perhe on kasvanut! Uusien pentujen, Cindyn, Rosien, Charlien ja Brodyn tulee oppia, mita joulu oikeasti tarkoittaa. Kun Pup Starin pahikset juonivat pilaavansa joulun, pennut paatyvat pohjoisnavalle pelastamaan joulupukin ja jouluhengen. Heidan seikkailunsa on taynna uusia pentumaisia lauluja, jotka levittavat joulun riemua vuoden ympari.

programme.title: So This Is Christmas
programme.desc: Ashley Young on joutunut ojaan elamaansa ja hengailua vaara ihmisia yrittaa paeta kaikkea draama. Yhtakkia kaikki tuntuu muuttaa suuntaa, kun he palkkasivat kasityolainen kannustaa hanta sietaa 1. Heinakuuta pelata oikeudettoman nuorille. Ashley nakee mahdollisuuden parantua oman levoton perheen kannustamalla muita enemman avun tarpeessa. Yhdessa he loytavat hammastyttavaa, mita voi helposti åstakomma kautta ihana lahja, joka vain antaakseni muille.

programme.title: A Taste Of Christmas
programme.desc: Kun pikkukaupungin yrittelias leipuri Emily saa omatekoisen joulukalenterin salaiselta ihailijalta, paikalliset haluavat kiihkeasti selvittaa lahettajan henkilollisyyden. Kaupungissa juoruillaan seka joulukalenterista etta Emilyn rakkausseikkailuista, koska kaikki poikamiehet ovat kiinnostuneita hanesta. Mutta Emilya kiinnostaa hanen pahin kilpailijansa, ranskalaisleipuri Gerard.

programme.title: Joulu tilauksesta
programme.desc: Gretchen saa joulun tapahtua missa ja milloin tahansa.

programme.title: Bennettin Laulujuhla
programme.desc: Bennettin ja Songin perhe palaa jouluksi uutisten kera. Rouva Song odottaa lasta 14 adoptiolapsen joukkoon. Perheen on lyottaydyttava yhteen haastaakseen kiinteistokehittajan, joka haluaa sulkea setansa monitoimitalon vammaisille ja vaarassa oleville lapsille. Rakkaudella, tiimityolla ja joulun taikuudella paiva pelastuu!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 WSOF32: Moraes vs. Hill 2
