programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Journey To The West
programme.desc: Finding no way forward in Japan, Masashi looks to break through overseas. But although bonsai had spread widely in his master’s time, it seems doomed to wither if someone doesn’t do something to make the art form fun and relevant in a fast paced modern world. Finally on a trip to Italy, Masashi Hirao may have found a way to break the wall and build a bridge to new audiences. He determines to topple a 1000 years of tradition and turn the art of bonsai into a pop culture phenomenon, combining it with other art forms and focused on the process of creation as much as on the result.

programme.title: Last preps
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Last preps
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni’s boys are born! But they came in a little bit early, and have been admitted in neonatal resuscitation... Coralie and Florent are still walking on clouds as they wait for their daughter, Lena. So are Nathalie and Naoufel, who arrange a tour of the future baby’s bedroom. Things are still tense between Kim and her parents. Her father blames here for having left school too early and the family makes no effort to hide their dislike of Pierre, the would-be father, who is still a no-show. They go as far as opposing Kim’s preferred choice for the future boy’s name, since it was his father that came up with the idea...

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

programme.title: The Challenge of Leadership
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - The Challenge of Leadership
programme.desc: After years of struggling Masashi Hirao feels he is finding clues to bonsai’s future, changing bonsai’s image of tired old men pruning trees. He has a radical idea to challenge tradition further at the 3-yearly international Setouchi Triennale, the largest art event in Japan. Masashi will stage an Avant Garde personal exhibition as well as a ground-breaking solo performance climaxing with a collaboration with a radical, anti-modernisation punk band, in direct contradiction of Masashi’s mission. It will be a bonsai showdown. Tradition and modernisation clashing head on. Is it possible to pursue change, and preserve tradition? Masashi is in unexplored territory.

programme.title: Saviour or Saboteur
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Saviour or Saboteur
programme.desc: Masashi Hirao is building an entirely new brand, and a new art form: performance bonsai. His quest to push boundaries brings fresh challenges, which come to the fore as he heads to Kuala Lumpur to team up with unconventional Malaysian realist painter, Lee Mar. Little goes to plan and the event strains both artist’s talents to the limit. But the challenge is nothing compared to the test when his radical approach wins him an invitation to the international Bonsai Without Borders Summit in China: 75 world-class Bonsai Masters from 35 countries. The bonsai bad boy has officially arrived on the world stage. It is the ultimate test in front of the most critical audience possible.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Canada - Quebec - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Canada - Quebec - Part 2
programme.desc: Canada is the second largest country in the world by land mass and contains amazing natural resources: 7% of the Earth’s drinking water is spread over the country’s thousands of lakes. Forests cover 45% of the territory. Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes off to discover these resources with those whose job it is to protect them. He takes a look at the ecological balance sheet of the world’s eighth-largest economic power.

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.desc: Above all, these reports are an opportunity for Yann Arthus-Bertrand to take stock of the planet and denounce certain human behaviors that are at the root of dramatic, even irreversible, environmental and climatic degradation. Off to Tokyo, then Kenya, to an animal sanctuary. Then on to Mount Fuji to learn how to live there, and all the plastic that clogs up the seas. Reports will focus on everyday products, chosen for their destructive production practices for both people and the environment.

programme.title: The taste of bread
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of bread
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes you on a bread trail to uncover the dedicated artisan bakers and millers. Her adventure will lead her through the Libourne region, then onwards to the North of France, the Ardèche, and the Aisne, where bakers have transformed bread into a powerful catalyst for social cohesion. While some individuals may avoid bread, particularly due to gluten-related concerns, others have chosen to reposition it at the forefront of the dining experience by championing its nutritional benefits. This commitment is shared by several chefs whom Julie will meet at the conclusion of her expedition.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.desc: Val Kahl is in the heart of Ojai, the lavender town, where she takes a tour in Ojai Valley Lavender Festival and tastes drink, gluten-free cookies and organic cooking products made of lavender. She later found herself in the middle of lavender field while stopping by the Frog Creek Farm. After working out on the hot power yoga around palm trees in Caravan Outpost, she heads out to Gratitude Rock for an organic fresh juice tasting with an avocado ranch view.

programme.title: Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.desc: Val goes to Nicholas, a master of enlightenment, at his wellness ranch. Here, Val will try out some new high-tech relaxation sessions. She will then go to one of the zenest hotels in California, where she will participate in a yoga session in a Japanese pagoda, followed by a coconut massage. She will test a Cryo-Cafe, a new concept store that mixes coffee break and cryotherapy session. Finally, she will attend a Theremin session, a very special relaxation ceremony.

programme.title: Thinning seedlings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Thinning seedlings
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to continue gardening together. In our previous episodes, we sowed chives and radishes. Today, were going to learn how to take good care of them. And as a bonus, well show you a great technique to easily get even more plants in your garden. Lets get started!

programme.title: Risotto with asparagus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Risotto with asparagus
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare a creamy asparagus risotto, a delicate and refined dish. Arborio rice is slowly simmered in a flavorful broth, then combined with crisp asparagus and melted Parmesan. A hint of lemon and fresh herbs enhances this delicious and comforting meal.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.desc: Juliette has long been aware of the delicate beauty of nature. For years she spent her life on the sea, organising regattas for the traditional sailboats that are famous in the French region of Morbihan. Her appreciation for the elements made for a smooth transition as she decided to leave the water behind and return to the earth. Learning to shape a ball of clay into a graceful and elegant object, she discovered a passion for ceramics. Today, she lives from her creations and makes pieces that reflect their surroundings, the stunning Gulf of Morbihan.

programme.title: Anna (Brittany)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Anna (Brittany)
programme.desc: Anna’s unusual background provided inspiration for her life change. Her career began as a wolf trainer for cinema and it was during these years that she developed her deep love for animals. After being tired of seeing them used as props and constantly in cages, she decided to leave the world of show business behind and start an eco-friendly sheep and goat pasture. To further share her passion for these gentle animals, Anna has opened a conservatory farm where visitors can experience first-hand the joys of being close to nature. She also makes amazing goat cheese!

programme.title: Cristina (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Cristina (Spain)
programme.desc: At 31 years old, the last thing Cristina expected when she went to see the doctor about a blocked ear was to leave the consultation with a diagnosis for Breast Cancer. This young and passionate sociologist decided to apply the same philosophy to her treatment as she did when surfing: when a wave crashes down on you, get up and try again. Through her healing journey she deepened her love for the ocean and also discovered the therapeutic capabilities of yoga for cancer patients. Today she shares her practice through surf and yoga retreats and is specialised in oncological yoga, helping others heal.

programme.title: Idoia (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Idoia (Spain)
programme.desc: Idoia thrives on weaving together the sources of inspiration that surround her. Heavily influenced by the natural beauty of her home region of Galicia, Spain, she creates unique woven pieces from diverse and beautiful materials. Idoia’s pieces represent her vision of a modern woman, drawing from the traditions and experiences of those who perfected the craft before her and also pushing to innovate and adapt her creations for the modern world. Her recent collaboration with luxury fashion house Loewe is a dream come true for this modern artisan.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: A la carte grills
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - A la carte grills
programme.desc: If youre a nature enthusiast and a fan of outdoor cooking, the upcoming season is perfect for barbecue enthusiasts! Our journey will take us to Aube, nestled in the heart of the Brevonnes forest, and then to the Massif des Bauges, where grilling and snow create a unique combination. Afterward, well explore the Libournais region, where well uncover cooking techniques that make use of vine shoots, which are plentiful in the area. Just a short distance from the vineyards, well arrive at another corner of Gironde, the Blaye region, where the cooking method remains consistent but features a distinctly local ingredient: eel.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Cryotherapy and Vinyasa Yoga
programme.desc: Its in an episode full of surprise that we meet with Val Khal in the heart of Los Angeles for a visit to the new trendy wellbeing boutique Springs. This new concept store offers the opportunity to make Vinyasa yoga wearing a trendy outfit, treat yourself to a revitalizing juice detox before heading to a Cryotherapy session without leaving the venue! programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.desc: Val takes us to Los Angeles, on the roof of one of the most prestigious hotels in Beverly Hills for a session of acro yoga, aerial acrobatic yoga. Then, in the heart of Downtown, Val will experience a glass slide down one of the tallest towers in California. Shell also try SandBox Fitness, the trendy indoor surfing class, before trying Lazerfit, a new way to work out that combines warm-up, stretching and laser tag.

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and amazing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We go to China in the province of Yunan, where a plant with exceptional virtues against malaria has been discovered. Then we travel to Africa, where mans intervention in the ecosystem of Lake Victoria has triggered a considerable imbalance. We will also explore to Greenland to meet the polar bears, the first victims of the melting ice.

programme.title: Sweets on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Sweets on the menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us down a different kind of yellow-brick road, one that tastes of childhood and gourmet delights: the road of sweets. France may be famous for its gastronomy, but its not to be outdone when it comes to pastries and confectionery - quite the opposite. “Betises” from Cambrai, "Berlingots” from Carpentras, "Calissons” from Aix-en-provence, every region in France has its own sweet or confectionery.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Acrobatic Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Acrobatic Yoga
programme.desc: In this episode, Val gets to know Jamie and her thirty gons whom mystical sounds invite to introspection and relaxation in a relaxing setting. She then attends a perilous acrobatic yoga class with Vibe Yoga where her sense of balance has been challenged a few times. Believe or leave! This is Bol Meditation’s motto where Val discovers the benefits of Intense meditation on our body and mind. All together, this place is a piece of heaven in the middle of ettic L.A.

programme.title: Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye

Then well meet Mia Frye who will present us all the detox cures of the moment at Atelier Nubio. Finally, Val will test gluten-free gourmet waffles, both sweet and savory, the new trendy dessert for Parisian women.

programme.title: Melliferous plants
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Melliferous plants
programme.desc: Lets get together to continue discovering new plants together. Look at all these flowers, they are honey plants. But what are honey plants? Doesnt that make you think of another word? The word honey? Yes, because honey plants are plants that attract insects, and in particular bees, which feed on these flowers to make honey.

programme.title: Destination Sardinia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Sardinia
programme.desc: The first stop on this journey to the land of happy, long life is the Ogliastra region of Sardinia. Here, almost one in five inhabitants is over 90 - 20 times more than in France! Yet this is a far cry from the Mediterranean diet recommended by nutritionists: meat and cholesterol galore. Even more astonishing, consanguinity is paradoxically conducive to the extreme longevity of the inhabitants... our wellness food specialist and a general practitioner will investigate these phenomena and meet nonagenarians and centenarians with exceptional stories.

programme.title: Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.desc: To better understand the role of these explosive mountains located all over the world, on land or under the sea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes to Italy, the country with the most active volcanoes in Europe. Accompanied by volcano expert Jacques-Marie Bardintzeff, the photographer meets those people who have chosen to live with « their » volcano, in spite of the dangers involved in this kind of proximity.

programme.title: The Lotus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Origami - Season 1 - The Lotus
programme.desc: Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 1
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and astonishing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We find ourselves in Kenya, where the biodiversity is particularly rich, in the Massaï Mara reserve. Then, in the Democratic Republic of Congo, where the worrying disappearance of hippos from Lake Edward has unexpected consequences for the survival of fishermen. Then, in the sanctuary of life, the Pantanal region in Brazil, where millions of animal and plant species are teeming, some of the worlds great wetlands also in danger. In Tasmania, Yann Arthus-Bertrand fights against the napalm deforestation of one of the oldest and most beautiful forests...

programme.title: The flavors of flowers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The flavors of flowers
programme.desc: Eating flowers might appear unconventional, but we often consume them without even realizing it. Consider artichokes, for instance : they are essentially large, unopened flowers. Capers are the preserved buds of flowers soaked in vinegar, and cloves are dried flower buds. We also find courgette flowers, saffron pistils, orange blossom water used to flavor pastries, and the violet sweets that evoke memories of our childhood. In addition to adding aesthetic appeal and providing a dose of vitamins to our plates, flowers elevate the flavors of a dish and can even serve as a vegetable substitute.

programme.title: Hot Yoga Session
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Hot Yoga Session
programme.desc: Always on the look for looking for new detox discoveries, Val leads us to Lifehouse’s tonic and elixirs. Here, she discovers the range of elixir with therapeutic virtues exhilarating and relaxing. Before leaving, we made a hook by Jacks lab to prepare our own elixir. A private hot Yoga session then awaited Val at the popular Urban Exhale Hot Yoga where wearing a swimsuit could be welcomed. This episode ends on a fruity note as we tasted smoothies with unusual names that seduced Val, especially the 72 and Sun.

programme.title: Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.desc: Val gives an appointment to the singer Sinclair, for a floating session: a sensory deprivation technique in a bath. Then, we will discover an experience that is all the rage across the Atlantic, the Barre Shape! Its a class that mixes classical dance, yoga and cardio training. All this in a girly and boudoir atmosphere. After the effort comes comfort! We will meet a Superfood expert who will make us test and discover all the "Superfoods" that are very popular in California and that the whole healthy world is talking about.

programme.title: Collecting seeds
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Collecting seeds
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to save seeds. As you may have noticed, fruits, such as apples and lemons, contain seeds, but so do some of the vegetables you eat, such as peppers and tomatoes. This is because they are, in fact, fruits just like the apple and the lemon. They come from a flower and therefore contain seeds.

programme.title: Destination Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Okinawa
programme.desc: Genetic, biological, cultural and dietary factors combine to make the Japanese island of Okinawa a zone of extreme longevity. Why is it that cancer is virtually non-existent here? Well see that the famous Japanese trio of "rice, fish and soy" is not the key to longevity, but a diet based on plants, lots of green leafy vegetables and endemic sweet potatoes. Self-restriction and strong social ties are other elements that our naturopathic chef and attending physician will discover on site, together with local inhabitants and scientists.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #40: BetCity Royal Championships Queen and King of the Court 2023
programme.desc: Dieses Turnier ist groSSer als je zuvor, die besten Spieler der Welt kommen vom 5. bis 10. September nach Manhattan an der Maas. Ein konigliches Stadion direkt im Stadtzentrum am Henegouwerplein ist der Schauplatz und Nebenplatze in den Vororten umrahmen dieses Ereignis.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #41: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023
programme.desc: Der VANORA ENGADINWIND by Dakine kehrt 2023 mit viel spannender Windsurf-Action auf dem Silvaplanasee in der Schweiz zuruck. Der ENGADINWIND ist auch Gastgeber der ersten iQ FOiL U21 Weltmeisterschaft, die fur das olympische Programm in Paris 2024 ausgewahlt wurde.

programme.desc: Highball bouldering in Switzerland’s Ticino and the redpoint ascent of the “Rote Wand” in /VorarlbergAustria. Beside adrenaline packed action this is also a story of trust and friendship as well as responsibility for yourself.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsportsteam 2015 - Mountainsports: Climbing and Unicycling
programme.desc: Climbing on speed record in Yosemite Valley (USA) / Unicycling on the Damavand (IR) / Climbing at the Burser Platte (Austria). Various athletes, different outdoor sports and unique stories - this combines the adidas Outdoorsportsteam.

programme.title: Go Big or Go Home - Freestyle Kayak
programme.desc: Go big or go home - in search of the perfect waveadidas Outdoorsportsteam: Nick Troutman, Mat Dumoulin, Gerd Serrasolses and Peter CsonkaNo distance is too great for these four athletes - their quest takes them and their kayaks from Africa to North America.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the worlds most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the worlds most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #18: If it’s easy it’s not fun
programme.desc: Join us on a beatiful adventures through the sky and desert of Jordan, where three french friends seek for adrenalin and creacks in the sandstone of Wadirum (JOR).

programme.title: WOF 2023 #34: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU)
programme.desc: Bei der diesjahrigen Jubilaumsausgabe gehen Teilnehmer aus uber 55 Nationen an den Start, darunter die weltbesten Hard-Enduro-Fahrer wie Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WOF 2023 #39: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukunftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #34: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: Episode 45
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 45

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: WOF 2024 #34: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 and 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #35: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: WOF 2024 #36: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features a chase in Arizona, a random act of arson in Oklahoma and rioting in Australia.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features the wildest roadside stops caught on camera.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features an alleyway shoot-out, a stolen police SUV and a prisoner who takes a head-first dive.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features a chase in Tennessee, a parole violator on the run and a stolen moving van.

programme.title: Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Worlds Wildest Police Videos
programme.desc: This episode features a chase in South Carolina, a convenience store robbery and rioting in Brazil.

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 4
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster The Winged Dragon of Ra and targets it to annihilate the rest of Joey’s life points! However, is Odion able to control the ultimate power of an Egyptian God, or will The Winged Dragon of Ra punish all those unworthy of summoning it?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 1
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City Finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it’s a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing life points equals losing your memories! As Marik’s true sinister self comes to the surface, does Mai stand a chance against this malevolent evil?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 2
programme.desc: As Mai loses more and more of her memories under Marik’s relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends’ neverending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 3
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik’s The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she’s unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities! Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself and incinerates Mai with the full fury of The Winged Dragon of Ra?

programme.title: A Duel With Destiny: Kaiba Vs. Ishizu, Part 1
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City Finals, Kaiba’s mystery opponent is… Ishizu! With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play! Does Kaiba stand a chance against an opponent who knows his moves even before he does?

programme.title: A Duel With Destiny: Kaiba Vs. Ishizu, Part 2
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel – she will defeat Kaiba with her trap! How can Kaiba win when it’s already destined that he will lose? It’s time for Kaiba to change the future!

programme.title: The Tomb-Keepers Secret
programme.desc: As Marik’s evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Marik Vs. Bakura, Part 1
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and the Millennium Ring, and the loser will be trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever! To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally in the form of… another Marik?

programme.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Marik Vs. Bakura, Part 2
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm! But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all!

programme.title: A Virtual Nightmare !
programme.desc: As Kaiba’s blimp speeds towards KaibaCorp Island for the final rounds of the Battle City Tournament, the ship is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen – five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba’s past who are out for revenge! With the power of cyberspace on Noah’s side, Yugi and friends are trapped inside a new and dangerous Duel Monsters game!

programme.title: Isolated in Cyber Space — Part 1
programme.desc: Noah displays the power of his virtual world by splitting up Yugi’s gang and flinging them into the far reaches of his self-created universe! The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley’s Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Isolated in Cyber Space — Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against Gansley, in the form of "Deepsea Warrior", but struggles with the complexities of the dueling field and the new rules. Tea faces peril from a vicious tribe of cyclopses while Kaiba and Mokuba are brought to a setting similar to their old orphanage.

programme.title: Isolated in Cyber Space — Part 3
programme.desc: Yugis strategy is hindered by Gansleys Deck Master ability. Tristan and Duke face a mean dinosaur to save Serenity. Meanwhile, Kaiba and Mokuba confront painful visions of their miserable childhood, but within the heartache may lurk the key to Noahs true intentions.

programme.title: Isolated in Cyber Space — Part 3
programme.desc: Yugis strategy is hindered by Gansleys Deck Master ability. Tristan and Duke face a mean dinosaur to save Serenity. Meanwhile, Kaiba and Mokuba confront painful visions of their miserable childhood, but within the heartache may lurk the key to Noahs true intentions.

programme.title: Freeze Play — Part 1
programme.desc: Tea is led by a penguin to Crump, in the form of Nightmare Penguin, who challenges her to a duel. She learns immediately that dueling in the virtual realm differs starkly from her previous duels, and starts to succumb to the virtual playing field.

programme.title: Freeze Play — Part 2
programme.desc: Despite gaining a lead with Maha Vailo, Tea falls behind as Crump begins an assault on her life points, causing the ice around her to grow. With the help of her Deck Master, Dark Magician Girl, and Yugis Dark Magician, Tea gains enough confidence to win.

programme.title: Courtroom Chaos — Part 1
programme.desc: Joey faces the Big 5s lawyer, Johnson, in a courtroom duel. Joey pulls an early lead with his Deck Master, Flame Swordsman, but Johnsons Deck Master, Judge Man, has abilities of his own.

programme.title: Courtroom Chaos — Part 2
programme.desc: Joey attempts to pull through with several luck-based cards, but Johnsons cheating tactics ruin all his chances, until an angry Noah puts a stop to him.

programme.title: Mechanical Mayhem — Part 1
programme.desc: Tristan, Duke and Serenity duel Nesbitt, the Big 5s mechanical expert. Serenitys lack of experience with the game and Nesbits powerful machine monsters create a tragic end for Tristan.

programme.title: Mechanical Mayhem — Part 2
programme.desc: With Tristan gone and Serenity in shock, Duke attempts to defeat Nesbitt by himself. But when Orgoth the Relentless is destroyed by his Perfect Machine King, Duke tries to help Serenity regain confidence in her abilities. The two later remember Tristans face down card, hoping it will help them win.

programme.title: Settling the Score — Part 1
programme.desc: As Nesbitt (in Tristans body) kidnaps Mokuba, Kaiba is forced to duel Lector, the former assistant to his stepfather. For Lector, the duel is personal, as he plans to take what he believes is rightfully his—KaibaCorp. Meanwhile, Tristan rejoins the group; his friends do not recognize him, since his mind has been downloaded into a mechanical monkey.

programme.title: Settling the Score — Part 2
programme.desc: With Lectors Jinzo Deck Master destroying all of Kaibas traps, Imperial Order destroying all his spell cards, and Lectors unreachable Satellite Cannon striking from space, Kaiba doesnt seem to stand a chance. Mokubas unwavering faith in Kaiba keeps him believing that his brother will pull out with a victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood.

programme.title: Noahs Secret
programme.desc: Yugi, Kaiba, and Tea are separated from the others as the Big 5 (minus Nesbitt) plan to take their bodies anyway. As Noah tortures Kaiba by brainwashing Mokuba, he reveals his true identity as Gozaboro Kaibas biological son.

programme.title: Merger of the Big Five — Part 1
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five, who are using Tristans body.

programme.title: Merger of the Big Five — Part 2
programme.desc: The Big 5 attempt various strategies of victory, with the aim of eliminating Joey first. However, their poor teamwork soon puts Yugi and Joey ahead. Lector then calls their most powerful monster to the field, the Five Head Dragon.

programme.title: Merger of the Big Five — Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey are forced to use their strongest monsters to take down the Five-Headed Dragon.

programme.title: Brothers in Arms — Part 1
programme.desc: Kaiba and Noah duel for full control of KaibaCorp, but Noahs revelations and constant manipulation of the playing field complicate things for Kaiba.

programme.title: Brothers in Arms — Part 2
programme.desc: Noahs Shinatos Ark puts Kaiba in a difficult position, as he scrambles to find a winning strategy.

programme.title: Brothers in Arms — Part 3
programme.desc: Kaiba regains control of the duel, but Noah brings a brainwashed Mokuba out to hinder his plans. After finally breaking through to Mokuba, Kaiba tries to embrace his brother before Noah, jealous over their close relationship, turns them to stone.

programme.title: Noahs Final Threat — Part 1
programme.desc: Enraged at Noahs cruel games, Yugi takes over for Kaiba and duels Noah with only 400 life points.

programme.title: Noahs Final Threat — Part 2
programme.desc: Yugis efforts to win the duel are further complicated by Noah, who turns all of his friends into stone statues, leaving Yugi feeling alone and without hope.

programme.title: So Close Yet So Far
programme.desc: Gozaboro Kaiba reveals himself and plans to virtualize the entire world to create a digital kingdom. With Noahs unlikely aid, Yugi and the others must escape while fending off memories from the past.

programme.title: Burying the Past — Part 1
programme.desc: Using Mokubas body, Noah escapes and sets the virtual world to self-destruct. But Mokubas kindness breaks through his heart, and he tries to set the others free. Meanwhile, Kaiba duels Gozaboro, who summons a seemingly unstoppable monster—Exodia Necross.

programme.title: Burying the Past — Part 2
programme.desc: ami Marik destroys the computers in the control room, disabling the controls for the self-destruct mechanism, which turns the situation desperate. Meanwhile, Kaiba defeats Gozoboro Kaiba, and he and Yugi rush to the exit before the virtual world explodes. Noah erases Gozoboros files and releases his mind, and finally makes peace with his family, and prepares for the destruction of the virtual world.

programme.title: Back to Battle City — Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and the others arrive at KaibaCorp Island and The Battle City Finals resume. To decide who will duel whom, the four duelists--Yugi, Joey, Kaiba, and Marik-- face each other in a four-way duel in the Duel Tower.

programme.title: Back to Battle City — Part 2
programme.desc: The four-way duel continues with Joey determined to duel Marik in order to save Mai while Marik and Kaiba both intend to face Yugi. Meanwhile, Ishizu reflects on her past.

programme.title: Back to Battle City — Part 3
programme.desc: With the conclusion of the four-way duel, the match-ups for the semi-finals are determined — Joey will duel Marik while Yugi will be facing off against Kaiba.

programme.title: The Darkness Returns — Part 1
programme.desc: Marik brings Joey and himself to the Shadow Realm, where each duelists heart is linked with his monsters, suffering the pain that the monsters feel.

programme.title: The Darkness Returns — Part 2
programme.desc: Mariks duel tactics eat away at Joeys deck and his life points. Joeys comeback strategy, however is hindered by Mariks new monster on Joeys side of the field.

programme.title: On Your Mark, Get Set, Duel!
programme.desc: Within Satellite, a location segregated from a luxurious utopia, New Domino City; lies Yusei Fudo, a young duelist and Duel Runner enthusiast who is plotting revenge against his rival and former friend, Jack Atlas, the current King of New Domino City in an attempt to reclaim his stolen Duel Runner and "Stardust Dragon" card. However, Yusei must first deal with Sector Security as they attempt to arrest his friend Rally Dawson for stealing a Duel Runner piece for Yuseis Duel Runner.

programme.title: Creepy Crawlies
programme.desc: Yusei reminisces about the past whilst developing his Duel Runner in preparation for sneaking into New Domino City and reclaiming what was stolen from him. In the meantime, Blitz, Nervin and Tank become involved in a fight with Lenny, Lug and Larry who then turn up at Yuseis hideout and demand his Duel Runner. To protect his friends and their bonds, Yusei duels Lenny with his Duel Runner on the line.

programme.title: Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: The time has finally arrived for Yusei to sneak into New Domino City so he can settle the score with Jack and reclaim what was stolen from him. However, Tetsu Trudge interrupts Yuseis plan and uses the imposed "Speed World" to force Yusei into a Turbo Duel.

programme.title: A Blast from the Past, Part 1
programme.desc: Yusei finally manages to meet Jack in New Domino. Here, they hold a Turbo Duel with Yuseis "Stardust Dragon" on the line. Yusei is determine to have his card back and get his revenge on his former friend.

programme.title: A Blast from the Past, Part 2
programme.desc: Yusei continues his Turbo Duel with Jack after Jack has managed to Summon both their aces "Red Dragon Archfiend" and "Stardust Dragon". Yusei is able to gain control of "Stardust Dragon" with "Harmonia Mirror". But unknown to them, the summoning of the two dragons trigger an event that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Facility, Part 1
programme.desc: Yusei Fudo has been caught by the Sector Security and sent to the Facility. In the paddy wagon, he meets a man called Tenzen Yanagi whom he befriends. The former Pro Duelist, Bolt Tanner, meets Yusei there. Tanner challenges Yusei, who is unable to Duel since he doesnt have a Deck. As a result, Yanagi Duels in his place.

programme.title: The Facility, Part 2
programme.desc: Disgusted by Tanner speaking ill of Yanagis cards and stomping on them, Yusei Duels Tanner using Yanagis Deck, in order to teach him that no card is truly unneeded (in the dub he wanted to teach him what respect really means).

programme.title: Fire It Up!
programme.desc: The Securities examine Yuseis body for confirmation of his Mark of the Dragon. Meanwhile, Jack has learned of the legend of the Crimson Dragon and forces himself to obey Goodwin and hosts a Turbo Duel between him and Hunter Pace, who wants a rematch with him.

programme.title: The Lockdown Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: Mr. Armstrong harasses Yuseis friends in front of him and Yusei duels Armstrong with his freedom and the safety of his friends on the line. Armstrong has seized all of Yuseis Decks so Yusei duels him using cards given to him from his friends at the Facility.

programme.title: The Lokcdown Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Yusei continues his Duel with Mr. Armstrong, using cards given to him by inmates at the Facility. Despite Armstrongs brutal attack, Yusei refuses to abandon his friends and lose his freedom.

programme.title: The Take Back, Part 1
programme.desc: In order to get back his Deck and Duel Runner, Yusei meets a man named Blister, but he is soon pursued by Trudge, who still wants to get his revenge on Yusei.

programme.title: The Take Back, Part 2
programme.desc: Yusei, who got back his Duel Runner and his Deck, continued his Turbo Duel with Trudge. Blister, who is witnessing the Turbo Duel, does not understand why Yusei is so determined to retrieve his "Bonds of Friendship".

programme.title: The Darkness Returns — Part 3
programme.desc: With life points dropping and his monsters unable to attack, Joey summons a monster that proves to be his saving grace, prompting Marik to unleash Ra.

programme.title: The Darkness Returns — Part 4
programme.desc: Despite surviving Mariks onslaught, Joey is weakened by the shadow games effects and succumbs just as he is about to win the duel. Yugi struggles to find hope after losing his best friend to the Shadow Realm.

programme.title: Clash in the Coliseum — Part 1
programme.desc: The second duel of the semi-finals begins with Yugi dueling Kaiba for the second spot in the grand final and the chance to duel Marik. Kaiba draws Obelisk on his first turn, but Yugi thwarts his attempts to summon it with Lightforce Sword.

programme.title: Clash in the Coliseum — Part 2
programme.desc: Kaiba and Yugi compete to summon their monsters to the field, but each is hindered by the others strategies.

programme.title: Clash in the Coliseum — Part 3
programme.desc: Kaiba is able to summon Obelisk the Tormentor, to the field, putting it at odds with Yugis own Slifer the Sky Dragon.

programme.title: Clash in the Coliseum — Part 4
programme.desc: With the destruction of both their monsters, Kaiba and Yugi are presented with a vision of the High Priests legendary battle against the Pharaoh. Kaiba believes this to be a mere illusion, but Yugi knows that it is a vision of the past. The duel continues with Kaiba and Yugi attacking with their signature cards.

programme.title: Clash in the Coliseum — Part 5
programme.desc: Kaiba gains a lead in the duel when he summons three Blue Eyes White Dragons. Yugis hopes of winning come to an end, but receives some encouragement from Joey and stays strong in the game. Meanwhile, Joeys dreams and the ongoing duel cause Joey to awake.

programme.title: Clash in the Coliseum — Part 6
programme.desc: Kaibas final move forces the duelists to use only three cards, forcing to use the best cards in the decks to win the duel.

programme.title: Battle for the Bronze — Part 1
programme.desc: Tired of Kaibas constant ridicule, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City tournament.

programme.title: Battle for the Bronze — Part 2
programme.desc: Joey manages to gain one of Kaibas strongest cards to help him advance in the duel. Meanwhile, Tea – possessed by the good half of Mariks soul – fights Yami Marik for control of the Millennium Rod.

programme.title: Battle for the Bronze — Part 3
programme.desc: After defeating Joey and taking third place in the tournament, Kaiba plans to destroy the Duel Tower and bury his past forever. Ishizu and Mokuba convince him otherwise, and he gives Yugi one all-powerful card that could give him a chance to defeat Marik in the final duel.

programme.title: The Final Face Off — Part 1
programme.desc: The final duel of Battle City begins. Yami Marik quickly turns it into a shadow game and sets it up so that if he or the Pharaoh loses, their hosts soul will be destroyed. Yugi convinces the Pharaoh not to worry about him and to keep dueling to save Mai, Bakura and the good Marik. Yami Marik quickly discards his Winged Dragon of Ra to the graveyard, planning to revive it. Yugi manages to summon Slifer the Sky Dragon using his three Knights.

programme.title: The Final Face Off — Part 2
programme.desc: Marik uses Ras effect to destroy Slifer and revives it once again to attack Yugi. Yugi plays the card Kaiba gave him, Fiends Sanctuary, to stop Mariks attack. He then uses Multiply in order to summon Obelisk the Tormentor and devastate Marik.

programme.title: The Final Face Off — Part 3
programme.desc: Mariks good half possesses Tea again and begs Yugi to destroy him along with his evil side,but he eventually weakens and begins fading away as his dark half loses life points. Yugi and the Pharaoh become hesitant to duel, not wanting to harm the good Marik. As he fades away, Marik appears to an unconscious Odion, thanks him for taking care of him and apologizes, wishing that he could take back his cruel actions. In a cliffhanger, Odion is revealed to have been awakened by Mariks apology.

programme.title: The Final Face Off — Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi continues fending off Mariks attacks, holding out until he has the cards he needs to defeat Marik. Finally, he summons Dark Magician and Dark Magician Girl and uses them to activate Ragnarok – a spell card with the ability to destroy all the monsters on Mariks field, including The Winged Dragon of Ra that he fused himself with. (The card actually negates and removes all cards Marik controls, at the cost of banishing all monsters to the graveyard that Yami Yugi has.) But Yami Marik claims that if Ra is destroyed (which will leave the good Marik with only 1 life point), then the good Marik will be too weak to resist the power of the Shadow Realm, and will consequently lose his soul....

programme.title: The Final Face Off — Part 5
programme.desc: Odion tries to get the good Marik to resist his evil half. As a result, Yami Marik becomes angered, and attacks Odion with the Millennium Rod, which weakens Odion even more. Odion doesnt give up, despite Ishizus protests. As Marik continues his onslaught (which begins to injure Odion), Odion tells Mariks good side that together, they had conquered his evil half before, and that they could do it again. Then, he tells the good Marik that since Yami Marik was created by the good Mariks hatred, he has the power to destroy him. As Yami Marik raises the Rod to deliver the final blow, the good Marik disappears from the field, and begins fighting against Yami Marik, who struggles for control...

programme.title: One for the Road
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang escape from the island in time, but they are forced to leave Kaiba and Mokuba behind. The brothers get away just as the island explodes using the Blue-Eyes White Jet. Yugis group heads back to Domino City, where they say their farewells and go their separate ways.

programme.title: Looking Back and Moving Ahead
programme.desc: Tea shows Serenity around the city, to all the sites of the important duels of the Battle City Tournament, while Joey duels Yugi to get his Red-Eyes Black Dragon back. Tea eventually meets up with Yugi, and they head off for further adventures.

programme.title: Looking Back and Moving Ahead
programme.desc: Tea shows Serenity around the city, to all the sites of the important duels of the Battle City Tournament, while Joey duels Yugi to get his Red-Eyes Black Dragon back. Tea eventually meets up with Yugi, and they head off for further adventures.

programme.title: A New Evil, Part 1
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! And, as if things couldn’t get any worse, real monsters begin to appear around the world, terrorizing the population!

programme.title: A New Evil, Part 2
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters on the field at once, but each creature receives a power boost!

programme.title: Legend of the Dragons
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse!

programme.title: The Creator Returns
programme.desc: Confusion abound when enemies become friends... and friends become enemies! Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they’re asked for help from a one-eyed former foe!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 1
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Wielding his newest whacked-out Toon terrors, Pegasus is ready to repeat his previous victory against Kaiba!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 2
programme.desc: Not only does Alister’s mighty fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba’s monsters!

programme.title: An Unexpected Enemy
programme.desc: On the way to Industrial Illusions, Yugi and friends are ambushed by a band of motorcycle thugs - until their favorite friend soars to the rescue!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 1
programme.desc: Can this be?! Mai has joined the enemy! Wielding the sinister sorcery of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai unequivocally calculates to trap Joey’s soul for Dartz’s malevolent master plan!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 2
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the arcane abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies into devastating combat formations!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 3
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer?

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world’s chaotic conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and a lost civilization!

programme.title: Fate of the Pharaoh, Part 1
programme.desc: Isolated on a steep mesa in Death Valley, it’s a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his group of guardian monsters!

programme.title: Fate of the Pharaoh, Part 2
programme.desc: Dartz’s master plan is finally revealed, and capturing Yugi’s soul is the catalyst to reset the very essence of history!

programme.title: Fate of the Pharaoh, Part 3
programme.desc: Using the awesome abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael’s guardians into garbage... but he’s also slowly succumbing to the card’s evil influence!

programme.title: Trial by Stone
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi’s soul! Having betrayed his dearest friend, the Pharaoh sinks into the darkest depths of despair and loses his will to save the world!

programme.title: On the Wrong Track, Part 1
programme.desc: Divide and conquer - it’s a train ride to terror! A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz’s new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately!

programme.title: On the Wrong Track, Part 2
programme.desc: While Weevil sneakily infests and genetically manipulates Yugi’s monsters to metamorphose them into crude creepy crawlers, Rex Raptor’s prehistoric predators take a more forceful approach and run roughshod over Joey’s forces!

programme.title: On the Wrong Track, Part 3
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil’s insect invasion!

programme.title: Self Destruction
programme.desc: The train derails and plummets into a chasm, leaving Yugi and Tea totally lost in the Rocky Mountains!

programme.title: Reliving the Past
programme.desc: Weakened by his journey into the dark reaches of his heart, Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn’t care!

programme.title: Deck of Armor
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Flight of Fear, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane flying at hundreds of miles per hour!

programme.title: Flight of Fear, Part 2
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat, a mechanical menace that’s not only armed with countless cannons but can also summon a battalion of Robot Tokens!

programme.title: Paradise Found
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! The timing couldn’t be any worse - the only supercomputer in the world that can decipher the Atlantean hieroglyphics is housed within the four walls of KaibaCorp!

programme.title: A Duel to Remember
programme.desc: Yusei Fudo is left unconscious after his harsh Duel with Trudge. The twins Leo and Luna rescue him. After Yusei regains consciousness, Leo demands a Duel with him. Meanwhile, Trudge waits outside in the hopes of capturing Yusei.

programme.title: Bloom of the Black Rose
programme.desc: Yusei Fudo decides to enter the Fortune Cup, after Lazar blackmailed him to do so, if he wants to see his friends at Satellite alive. On his way, he meets up with his old friends from the Facility, Bolt Tanner and Yanagi and his new friend, Leo at the Daimon Area. Leo and his friend Dexter went to the Daimon Area in order to challenge the mysterious Black Rose.

programme.title: Welcome to the Fortune Club
programme.desc: The Fortune Cup has now begun. The first Duel is Luna vs. Greiger. But since Luna doesnt want to participate, Leo disguises himself and Duels in her place.

programme.title: Battle With the Black Rose
programme.desc: Luna and Dexter try to cheer up Leo after his loss to Greiger. They approach Yusei, who tells him the experience he got from losing should prove useful later on. Leo encourages Yusei to win, just before Akiza passes them. She glares intensely at Yusei as she passes. The other three quickly step out of her way. Leo wonders what her problem is.

programme.title: Surprise , Surprise!
programme.desc: Hunter Pace, under the disguise of Shira, Duels Yusei Fudo in the Fortune Cup, using a Deck hes designed to use against Jack Atlas.

programme.title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1
programme.desc: Due to Rex Goodwins special permission, a consolation game is to be held. Luna is called to participate. Leo is unable to substitute and Luna reluctantly comes forward. Her opponent, Professor Frank, has a trip to the Duel Monsters Spirit World planned.

programme.title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2
programme.desc: Luna engages in her Duel with Professor Frank when she is called by a mysterious voice to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World Seeing the turmoil evildoers are doing to this land, Luna must take all her courage and skill at hand to defeat Franks trump card.

programme.title: Second Round Showdown, Part 1
programme.desc: The first day of the Fortune Cup comes to a close. Before their Duel begins tomorrow, Yusei and Greiger have a friendly talk during the night.

programme.title: Second Round Showdown, Part 2
programme.desc: Determined to carry out his mission to his hometown, Greiger uses "Flying Fortress SKY FIRE" to run Yusei down. In response, Yusei reads Greigers strategy and looks for his chance to counterattack.

programme.title: The Profiler
programme.desc: The second round of the finals pits Akiza Izinski against Commander Koda. Koda begins his strategy of tormenting Akiza with her record of the past 16 years, in which flashbacks of Akizas life are shown.

programme.title: Duel of the Dragons, Part 1
programme.desc: Yusei Fudo confronts and questions Akiza Izinski on why she calls the Mark of the Dragon a "wretched mark". During the Duel against her, Yusei is filled with various doubts about Akiza.

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 1
programme.desc: Dartz launches the final phase of his plan by having his minions of Orichalcos Soldiers attack all around the world, leaving Yugi and gang with no one left to trust!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 2
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon is pummeling Joey with punishing punches!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 3
programme.desc: With his scientifically-advanced armor, Valon systematically dismantles Joey’s every move!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 4
programme.desc: Joey and Valon’s battle rages as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the very same armor that Valon used against him!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 5
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel!

programme.title: Grappling with a Guardian, Part 1
programme.desc: Not only is Joey’s soul captured, but before this episode is over, another of our loved ones will also lose his or her soul!

programme.title: Grappling With a Guardian, Part 2
programme.desc: Rafael, unlike the Pharaoh, fully knows how to harness the powers of Seal of Orichalcos to his advantage to annihilate the Pharaoh while fortifying his own defenses!

programme.title: Grappling With a Guardian, Part 3
programme.desc: From the depths of darkness, Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated... for it resurrects automatically!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 1
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz’s base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all –with the entire navy as their escort!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 2
programme.desc: Dartz’s deepest secrets are finally revealed – including the fact that he’s over 10,000 years old!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 3
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 4
programme.desc: It’s a multi-pronged attack as Dartz adds a third ring to Seal of Orichalcos, stopping the Pharaoh and Kaiba from doing... anything!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 5
programme.desc: Kaiba’s soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 6
programme.desc: Dartz calls forth Divine Serpent Geh, a sinister snake with infinite attack points! Yugi counters by joining the three legendary dragon knights into the mighty Timaeus the Knight of Destiny, but is that enough to combat a monster with limitless strength?

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E315 This is Fate S1 E315
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E315 Undercover Love S1 E315
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E69 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E69
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E315 King of Hearts S1 E315
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E315 Second Chances S1 E315
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Jodha Akbar S4 E7
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Kedarnath
programme.desc: In the holy town of Kedarnath, a Muslim boy Mansoor drops pilgrims to their destinations as a porter while Mandakini, a high caste Brahmin girl, is engaged to marry a boy of the same caste. Faith brings the two together, but religion creates a barrier. Mandakini attempts suicide on the day of her marriage but is saved. Mansoor promises to take her out of the valley once she recovers. Mandakinis husband plans to kill Mansoor and drive his community out of the valley. But fatal floods strike, leaving everyones lives in danger.

programme.title: Khanna and Iyer
programme.desc: Fellow-collegians Aryan Khanna and Nandini Iyer fall in love with each other and want to get married, however, their respective parents, wealthy builder P.K. Khanna and equally wealthy MLA Ramanna Iyer, want them to marry in Punjabi and Madrasi families respectively, with Nandinis marriage already being finalized with U.S.-based Shekhar Iyer. Aryan and Nandini decide to elope and end up in the Dora jungles closely pursued by Iyer and Khanna and the Police, amidst a lot of media publicity. Iyer and Khanna display mutual loathing, mingled with Madrasi and Punjabi expletives. Both decide to change their tactics, temporarily declare a truce in order to placate and get their respective...

programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.
